name: Nichibutsu Mahjong Collection
description: Strip mahjong game featuring FMV scenes and photographs of models.

name: Arcade Daze
description: Sin descripción

name: Ganku Ganku
description: Search for the perfect fruit while evading your natural predators!

name: Puyo Puyo Fever: Minna de Nazo Puyo
description:
Puyo Puyo Fever: Minna de Nazo Puyo is a mobile game in the style of Nazo Puyo where players have to solve a number of puzzles within certain conditions.
It was released as part of the PuyoSega subscription service for iOS and Android and it is now considered lost media.

name: Nazo Puyo
description: Nazo Puyo is a Puyo Puyo spinoff for the NEC PC-9801. It is an expanded version of the Nazo Puyo mode featured in the PC-98 port of Puyo Puyo (1992).

name: Puyo Puyo!! Quest Arcade
description:
Puyo Puyo!! Quest Arcade is an arcade game, featuring puzzle RPG elements and a character card system. The game is basically free to play, only requiring cash for certain actions like refilling stamina. The game requires SEGA's Aime card (or the now-equivalent BanaPassport card from Bandai Namco Games) to store and recall gameplay status.

The service of Puyo Puyo!! Quest Arcade was announced to terminate after March 31 2017, with the removal of cabinets at schedules varying by shop. It will become impossible to play the game after that date.

name: Dark and Light
description:
Dark and Light was a pay to play fantasy MMORPG developed in Reunion Island by NPCube and published by Farlan Entertainment. It was released on June 6, 2006, to largely negative reviews. Though there was never an official announcement regarding discontinuation of service, the servers have been offline since 2008, ostensibly due to a lawsuit by VWORLD, LLC.

Snail Games acquired the rights to Dark and Light in 2008 and developed a "fantasy survival sandbox RPG", which was released as early access in 2017 with the same name.

name: Flapbound
description: Join Nuss as he embarks on an epic, highly-addictive journey through Birdland in order to save the universe from Guigus, the All-Inclusive Space Demolisher (GAME DOES NOT ACTUALLY FEATURE A PLOT. BE WARNED.).

name: Murder Mystery: Who Killed Linda Neuman
description: Murder Mystery: Who Killed Linda Neuman is an exciting and entertaining game developed by iWin Games. At the luxurious Paradise Island Resort, the Grand Fashion Show is just about ready to get underway. However, things come to an abrupt halt when the show’s top model, Linda, is found murdered in her room. The hotel manager is concerned with his hotel’s reputation and calls on the help of Detective Clara. However, as Detective Clara gets deeper into her investigation of the mysterious death of the famous model, she uncovers clues that lead her into a chaotic whirlwind of secrets and affairs. Just when she thinks she has found the perpetrator, she learns something else that takes her back to the drawing board. The plot thickens with each clue she finds!

name: Warhammer Underworlds: Shadespire Edition
description: Warhammer Underworlds – Shadespire Edition is a digital adaptation of the explosive, high- stakes, turn-based strategy tabletop game from Games Workshop that pits mighty warbands from the Age of Sigmar universe against one another in an eternal player versus player batle for Glory. Choose a warband, build your decks and carve a path to victory using dice-and-card mechanics that offer boundless strategic depth.

name: Samba de Amigo: Party Central - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Sonic the Hedgehog music DLC pack: Open your heart,
Reach for the Stars (Re-Colors), and I'm Here
- Sonic the Hedgehog and Tails costumes
- Space Channel 5, Super Monkey Ball, and PuyoPuyo costumes and accessories
- More music from SEGA fan-favorites: Space Channel 5, RGG Studio, and Rhythm Thief

name: The Jackbox Party Trilogy 3.0
description: Take your family get-together or work happy hour to the next level with The Jackbox Party Trilogy 3.0! This collection features all 15 hit games from Party Packs 7, 8, and 9. The best part? Your phone is your controller, so everyone can play - no special equipment required!

name: Doom & Destiny Worlds: Damsels & Dragons
description: Summon 3 playable heroines, sail to 9 uncharted islands, fight powerful horrors and craft epic gear in your final adventure!

name: Tochi T.U.N.R
description: A remake of an Action-Adventure game for the Playdate!

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days - Character Set 06: Taizo Kiyokura
description: Additional Card Set for Cardfight!! Vanguard: Dear Days!

name: Mystery Mansion
description: Escape from the haunted house.

name: Skautfold: Usurper
description: With Eldritch horrors having been unleashed by the outer-worldly Citadel, your job is to rid London of its terrors and defeat the Navigator!

name: Food Truck Tycoon + Knights & Guns
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure filled with culinary delights and medieval action with the Food Truck Tycoon + Knights and Guns Bundle!

name: Drill Deal: Oil Tycoon
description: Drill Deal is a fun oil business simulator. Start from a single tiny rig and expand it to a large complex of connected platforms. Optimize & grow your business. Look out for threats like weather, terrorists, fire, and others. Take care of your working crews.

name: Cassette Beasts: Deluxe Edition
description: This edition contains everything you need for the complete Cassette Beasts experience. Set out to explore the world of New Wirral with max expression, unique apparel, and accessories in the Cosplay Pack!

name: Battlefield 2042: Elite Edition
description: Packed to the brim with value, Battlefield 2042 Elite Edition brings 4 Seasons worth of content. Battle on 17+ maps, wield over 35 weapons, deploy as 14 Specialists, and enjoy the “Lost World” Epic Bundle.

name: Simulator Pack: Gas Station Simulator and Treasure Hunter Simulator
description:
Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

Dive into the exciting world of finding long forgotten treasures. Grab your metal detector and set off to explore the countryside. What today looks like a peaceful meadow might have been the scene of a fierce battle in the past, hiding now the valuable artefacts. Ready to dig in the past?

name: Moto Rush GT + Food Truck Tycoon
description: Embrace the thrill of high-octane racing and culinary mastery with the exhilarating Moto Rush GT + Food Truck Tycoon Bundle!

name: Kitten Island
description: In a land full of challenges, jumps, secret areas and meows. Play with a very special kitten. To win, break blocks, jump over other little animals, dodge dangerous spikes, and progress to the next level, all while traversing through diverse landscapes ranging from lush forests to icy glaciers and scorching deserts.

name: Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Modstand Bundle
description:
The Gerda: A Flame in Winter Modstand Bundle contains:

Gerda: A Flame in Winter (main game)
Gerda: A Flame in Winter - Liva's Story (DLC)

name: The Wonderful 101: Remastered - The Wonderful One: After School Hero - Part 2
description:
Get ready for a unique side-scrolling experience in the world of The Wonderful 101: Remastered! This free DLC lets you enjoy a brand new episode in which you experience Luka's story!

In Part 2 of this DLC, don't miss some brand new mode including a Caravan Mode and Online Rankings.

name: Snappy Chicks: Flappy Friends
description:
Rescue baby chicks by making pictures of you and your family in the photo library, and those of your Facebook friends jump into the game themselves!!
The joyful imagination will come true.

name: Hovercrash: Turbo Boost Racing
description:
Welcome to Hovercrash, a futuristic anti-gravity racer with thrills, tunnels and turbo boosts! Jump in to a hypersonic hovercraft and test your reflexes on the high speed race track!
Dodge crazy obstacles and fly at breakneck speeds as far as possible. And when you have learned the basics, lift your finger off the screen and increase your score multiplier even faster!
The energetic EDM soundtrack will give you an extra rush in the race for the high score!

name: SupaSupaCross
description: SupaSupaCross is an arcade style racing game where riders tap, tilt, and turbo-boost their way to the finish line. Be a SupaSupa star as you race across ten exciting stadium levels and increasingly difficult series challenges. A nostalgic top-down racing experience full of fun tracks, boost pads, slow-downs, and SupaSupa offroad action.

name: Little Red Riding Rogue
description:
Dear Little Red,
Stay on the path and be wary, for the woods are not filled with friends.
Orcs, and wolves are some of the dangers ahead.
The forest is endless and you will get no help.
Be careful, because when slaying monsters you become one yourself.
Yours truly,
Grandma Red

name: Plumber Bundle 3 in 1
description: Introducing the ultimate Plumber Bundle, a collection of three challenging puzzle games that will put your skills to the test and provide hours of entertainment.

name: Bunny Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Bubble Bobble Nostalgie: Christmas Edition
description:
The developers of Bubble Bobble Nostalgia also released an add-on called Christmas Edition.

In fact, this is the same Bubble Bobble Nostalgia, only with the atmosphere of the New Year or Christmas holidays: the title music is the notorious Jingle Bells, the dragons are dressed up in the costume of Santa Claus or Santa Claus, and the passwords are replaced with the names of attributes of the New Year or the same Christmas. Well, they changed the background and platforms in some levels. And the rest is the same.

name: Rainbow hotel
description: Short game. You are in hotell attacked by rainbow animals. You have to find keys and run out!

name: Just do It
description: Sin descripción

name: Cute Kitty
description: Sin descripción

name: Advance Wars by Web
description: Advance Wars by Web (aka. AWBW) is an unofficial site created by Aaron Marriner in 2004 that allows people to play Advance Wars multiplayer online in a web browser. AWBW is primarily based upon Advance Wars 2: Black Hole Rising with select gameplay elements added in from Advance Wars 1 and Advance Wars: Dual Strike, but also expands upon the vanilla experience by including a wider selection of COs than any previous game in the series, up to 16 players per match, additional content and quality-of-life (and some bugs and glitches here and there) and a broad array of community-focused features such as custom maps, spectator controls, replays and a ranked matchmaking system.

name: Sphizofrenia: Concept of Horror
description: Sphizofrenia is a concept of horror.

name: Legends of Haired Pyra
description: Legends of haired Pyra is multiplayer game endless runner.

name: Dynasty of Shadows
description: Sin descripción

name: Back to Medieval Village
description: Sin descripción

name: Spacident
description: Made for TK Game Jam.

name: Max Power Racing
description: Max Power Racing is a racing simulation game. It is licensed by the UK magazine Max Power. It features cars from various manufacturers. It features 31 tracks across 11 countries from all over the world, featuring cities, mountain roads as well as off-road tracks. You can play in arcade mode (to unlock tracks), player mode and championship mode. Player mode allows you to play against a friend or set personal records and in championship mode you play through all tracks. There are four difficulties to select from in the championship mode. You start with the lowest, but finishing first gains you points with which you can unlock the other difficulties and new and better cars to race with.

name: Back Fire
description:
A standard horizontal shoot'em up. The main weapon can be powered-up to provide faster and more powerful shots. Weapons such as lightning or three-way shots appear as power-ups. There are 18 levels to complete the game. If you use a credit to continue in levels 14 through 18, you will start back at level 13.

This game is a prototype or had a limited release.

name: Project Beksinski
description: Game inspired by images of Zbigniew Beksiński.

name: Steamfantasy: Unbelievable Korwin Story
description:
The game world is part of a destroyed planet that is similar to Earth with dimensions connected to it.
Your story begins in an alternate Hungarian Kingdom when King Korwin sends you to save his daughter and bring peace to the kingdom.

name: Hortal
description:
Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1
You need to escape from caves. Use holes to teleport and have fun!

name: Shape Shifter
description: Experience heart-pumping arcade shooter action. Each combat presents a new challenge as you adapt to a different ship with a unique way to play. Dodge an onslaught of bullets, blast through enemies, and shapeshift your way to victory.

name: Metro 2033
description:
Metro 2033 is a browser game, a Flash application hosted on the social networks VKontakte, Odnoklassniki, and Mail.ru. Officially available only on the PC platform, but in July 2022 a version was released on the HTML5 engine that allows you to play on the phone.

Metro 2033 invites you to plunge into the cruel world of the Moscow metro, where survivors of a terrible nuclear disaster live. The player will have exciting journeys through abandoned tunnels full of secrets and dangers, raids on the radioactive surface of dilapidated Moscow, battles with mutants and other stalkers.

Grow your battle pet, create a clan, join one faction or another, protect the metro from a terrible external threat - the mysterious "blacks".

At the moment, players have access to an incredibly wide arsenal of real weapons and equipment, dozens of habitable metro stations, hundreds of exciting story and side quests, exciting battles with mutants, other players and friends.

name: Pole Chudes 2015
description:
Guessing the words while watching a TV show?
Now you can play anytime on the screen of your phone or tablet!

Stretch your brain and make the most of your time in traffic, in line, or on your way to work.
Participate and win in 1/8, quarter-final, semi-final, final and super game.
Collect collections of prizes, achievements and take your rightful place in the ranking of players.
The bank of questions is constantly replenished! See you in the game!

Attention! All prizes in the game are fictitious, are pictures and do not give the right to receive real prizes. ;)

name: Zombie Squad
description:
Drive your way through a zombie apocalypse. Fire your guns and kill all zombies in your path. Avoid other cars and obstacles and get as far as you can.
Zombie Squad allows you to choose your car and upgrade it. Personalize your car by changing its weapon or its armor. Also, you can buy new car models in the store.
Kill all zombies in your way, gather as many coins as you can, and upgrade your ride in this amazing game for android!

name: Boyfriend to Death 2: Fresh Blood
description: A sequel to Boyfriend to Death, focusing on new characters Vincent, Cain and Lawrence.

name: Cosmo Knight Zion
description: The project involves significant changes in the story to create an original plot, as well as improvements to the game engine, the addition of new elements and improvements to the controls, changes in the levels, characters and enemies, and modifications to the music. Although the project is still in its early stages of development, I hope to work on it until it becomes a completely new and complete game.

name: Johny Vayna
description: A Spanish text adventure with illustrations.

name: Killer Kong
description: A Donkey Kong clone for the ZX Spectrum

name: Lancer Lords
description: Inspired on the Arcade game Joust

name: Dungeons of the Obelisk
description: A 2D, turn based, dungeon crawling, loot grinding adventure.

name: Aqua Ippan
description: Heavily inspired by arcade games from the 90s, Aqua Ippan is a ‘Shoot’em Up’/platformer game currently in development that can be played by one or two player(s). Despite being a modern game, it feels and plays like a true arcade classic, and pays homage to the Metal Slug series with its artstyle, detailed animations and jazz-fusion music.

name: Break Stuff VR
description:
Break Stuff in VR!! Smash for cash as a game show contestant. Throw and bash your way to victory!

Throw virtual objects in the visually stunning and exciting stages! Demolish an office construction site. Wreck a country parking lot. Crash apart a carnival. Shatter a china shop.

Swing baseball bats and sticks to break cool things! Bash away at fax machines and piñatas. Crush a showcase of expensive objects. Smash a fully destructible car!!

Have fun destroying virtual objects without the real clean up or consequences!
All ages and experiences levels. Easy to play, difficult to master.
Fun for everyone!

name: Bum Fights
description:
Get ready to brawl like never before in Bum Fights! Jump into the ultimate online multiplayer top-down shooter set in a nostalgic medieval world, where you rise from rags to riches as a penniless warrior fighting for survival and glory.

Experience fast paced action and intense combat as you battle other players in the arena, or team up to take on hordes of the undead. Arm yourself with a variety of weapons, from rusty knives to throwing rocks, and fight until you're the last one standing.

But beware: the competition is fierce, and only the strongest and most skilled will emerge victorious. With customizable characters and diverse game modes, there's always a new challenge around the corner.

Gear up for battle and enter the arena to prove your worth as the Lord of the Bums!

name: One.
description: One. is a remake of the 1999 visual novel One: Kagayaku Kisetsu he, developed by Nexton's sub-brand novamicus for the company's 30th anniversary.

name: Hana Awase: Mizuchi
description:
Volume 1 of Hana Awase.

A maiden's prayer shall make the flower bloom.

There is a card game called "Kasen", which is played with cards known as "Hanafuda". Only a handful of people, known as "Kaei", can call on and draw the power of the "flower". With most Kaei are men, the five students who possess the most power within the academy are referred to as the "Gokou" and are revered.

This is a story about a maiden who has dedicated herself to five male students aiming to become one of the Gokou, set in Kasen National Academy, which is a school that produces many individuals with rare talents.

name: Hana Awase: Himeutsugi
description:
Volume 2 of Hana Awase.

A maiden's prayer shall make the flower bloom.

There is a card game called "Kasen", which is played with cards known as "Hanafuda". Only a handful of people, known as "Kaei", can call on and draw the power of the "flower". With most Kaei are men, the five students who possess the most power within the academy are referred to as the "Gokou" and are revered.

This is a story about a maiden who has dedicated herself to five male students aiming to become one of the Gokou, set in Kasen National Academy, which is a school that produces many individuals with rare talents.

name: Hana Awase: Karakurenai/Utsutsu
description:
Volume 3 of Hana Awase.

A maiden's prayer shall make the flower bloom.

There is a card game called "Kasen", which is played with cards known as "Hanafuda". Only a handful of people, known as "Kaei", can call on and draw the power of the "flower". With most Kaei are men, the five students who possess the most power within the academy are referred to as the "Gokou" and are revered.

This is a story about a maiden who has dedicated herself to five male students aiming to become one of the Gokou, set in Kasen National Academy, which is a school that produces many individuals with rare talents.

name: Hana Awase: Iroha
description:
Volume 4 of Hana Awase.

A maiden's prayer shall make the flower bloom.

There is a card game called "Kasen", which is played with cards known as "Hanafuda". Only a handful of people, known as "Kaei", can call on and draw the power of the "flower". With most Kaei are men, the five students who possess the most power within the academy are referred to as the "Gokou" and are revered.

This is a story about a maiden who has dedicated herself to five male students aiming to become one of the Gokou, set in Kasen National Academy, which is a school that produces many individuals with rare talents.

name: Hana Awase Complete
description: Collection of all four volumes of Hana Awase for PC/Mac along with the series' soundtrack.

name: Hana Awase New Moon: Mizuchi
description: Port of Hana Awase: Mizuchi for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Hana Awase New Moon: Iroha
description: Port of Hana Awase: Iroha for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Hana Awase New Moon: Himeutsugi
description: Port of Hana Awase: Himeutsugi for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Hana Awase New Moon: Karakurenai/Utsutsu
description: Port of Hana Awase: Karakurenai/Utsutsu for the Switch, simultaneously released in Japanese, Chinese, and English.

name: Hana Awase: New Moon
description: Spanning across time and realities, Hana Awase: New Moon is the story of a young woman drawn into the web of the game kasen, played with hanafuda cards. Through playing, she comes to meet five mysterious men, all of whom are elite players and all of whom guard secrets that hold the power to alter her world irreparably.

name: System 10
description: System 10 is a home video game machine released by Epoch in 1978. Developed jointly with NEC and equipped with NEC's µPD770C chip. It has 10 built-in games, and you can play ponclone games such as tennis, ping-pong, and soccer, as well as shooting games using a gun-shaped controller. It is an early home-use game machine classified as the first generation. Later, a cheaper version of "System 10 M2" was also released. There is also an OEM model called "Toshiba Video Game TVG-610" which uses the same IC and has the same content developed by Epoch and released by Toshiba.

name: Bit Generations: Dialhex
description: bit Generations: Dialhex is a Game Boy Advance video game released in 2006 by Nintendo and skip, Ltd. The game was part of the initial batch of bit Generations games.

name: Sinking Iron
description:
A strong submarine earthquake caught the attention of an amateur diver and his apprentice.

They were close by when the incident happened and decided to investigate before officials arrived.

You are the apprentice. Good luck.

name: The Way
description: You are The Bard. Honouring the tradition of your people, you have come to the ruins of old Kc'tall to face The World-Eater. Eons ago, in The Time of Legends, your people worshipped The World-Eater as Qu'tall, God of conquest. In his name you subjugated an entire continent, countless cultures and vast lands. But left with nothing more to conquer, Qu'tall went mad, turned inwards and swallowed whole his own people. Your tribe was the sole survivor of the cataclysm. The Bards and Storytellers of the culture, you were sheltered by your patron God, Itotia, God of Arts. It is in her honour that your people, once in each generation, send a Bard to face the World-Eater.

name: Austrian Avian Association
description: Austrian Avian Association is an episode-length total conversion for Doom II. You play as Katarina Berger, a Schnabelperchten doctor who has to save her home (and, potentially, the world) from a sudden invasion of monsters caused by humans tampering with dark powers.

name: Recreational Warfare
description: RecWar is an action game where the main goal is to destroy as many vehicles as possible. To do this you have several weapons and unlimited ammo at your disposal. You can play over a network, splitscreen against your friends or just kill computer opponents. RecWar also includes team game and Capture the Flag play modes. The flag isn't just any flag though...

name: Gakuen Senki
description: Hero is student council president and everyday he solves requests from students. With each new request he approaches the secret behind this school.

name: Trick or Alice
description:
On the night of her birthday, Minase Arisa is inexplicably thrown into a Wonderland much like the one from Lewis Carroll's classic, a strange fairytale-like place that keeps repeating the same day over and over again. What's more, its inhabitants—each bearing an uncanny resemblance to someone whom Arisa knows in real life—insist that she is, in fact, their "Alice".

Will Arisa be able to get away? Or will she choose...

name: The Gold and Black Keys that Cannot Open
description:
Katagiri Kanade is a hikikomori who spent her days lazing off in her room. Her specialty is her broad imagination which often leads to various wild delusions. One night a weird cowboy guy appeared in her dream, saying that he’s her heart’s hero. Due to his encouragement, Kanade decided to try and go have a haircut the next day. It was then when she met a mysterious guy who cut her hair in the park, giving her courage to resume her school days.

Right after her haircut, Kanade was nanpa‘d by a guy who turned out to be her former classmate, Sudou Yukio. Kanade used to like him back then, and he was happy to meet her again. Kanade lives with her non blood-related brother, Sonomura Ikuto. Despite Ikuto’s warning, Kanade went looking for the mysterious guy who cut her hair the next day. She found him in the park, where he introduced himself as Hasui Tomoomi. He’s a professional hairdresser and owns a salon named Azalea nearby. Since Kanade was absent from school for so long, her homeroom teacher, Konno Chihiro, offered to help her with her studies.

Having these guys around her, what will happen to Kanade’s life from now on?

name: Joustish
description:
Joustish is a game that is very similar to the arcade classic Joust, but with some minor differences.

Flap around on your bird like a madman as you attempt to unseat the enemy bird riders! Hit an enemy when you are higher than them and they will be separated from their bird as a harmless egg. Don’t leave those eggs lying around, though, or a new enemy will eventually spring from it!

name: Palikat
description:
Palikat (Blocks in english) is a 1-player game only, controlled with a joystick. Steer to left or right with your stick. Press fire to rotate the piece clockwise. Pushing up on the stick will make the piece fully drop. Drop a little faster than the normal speed by pushing the stick down.

From the title screen you can adjust music volume, toggle sound effects on/off. You can also select your starting level. Each level the piece drops faster than in the previous level.

name: Waterfall
description: A shadowy figure seeks peace.

name: Death of the Augnob
description: An alien goes on a quest to defeat the Augnob.

name: Woodla: The Tower
description: Woodla: The Tower - the first game of Woodla augmented reality game series. Explore the world around you. Collect magical sets to get powerful spells. Fight the Astral creatures. Collaborate with your friends helping each other to progress. Go deeper in the Great Tower worlds to find the evil source and eliminate it.

name: Drifty
description:
Master the art of the drift!
Burn rubber on the city streets, kick up the dust in the desert and slide sideways through the Asian landscape. Make your way through the career or drift to the top of the leaderboards while earning many new cars, wheels and attributes.

name: RoundRick: Brick Breaker
description:
Round Rick: Brick Breaker game takes on the gameplay mechanic of the classic arcade hits Super Breakout or Arkanoid games while, at the same time, injects new features, mechanics and elements which will revolutionise the standard of arcade brick breaker games.

Swipe the screen to draw a line to let the marble bounce. Don't let the marble fall down our of the screen. Remember to swipe and draw!

name: Track Attack: Changes Everything
description: Sin descripción

name: Card Lords
description: Construct your dream deck from an amazing hoard of magical Creatures and Heroes in trading card game (TGC). Dozens of cards to collect with various qualities and abilities. Easy to pick gameplay with deep strategy ensured! Challenge yourself and other players in PvP Arena and try to be the best TCG card collector!

name: Squish Run
description: Welcome to the Squish Run! Are you quick enough to punch and run your way to the goal before a pointy wall of doom ends your day?

name: Dig Odyssey: Cosmic Mining
description:
Explore the depths of a distant planet as a space miner in this exciting digging game! Dig deep and uncover valuable metals and precious gems as you search for the source of a mysterious signal.
A mysterious signal was received from the depths of the nearest exoplanet to Earth. An experienced miner was sent to investigate it. He has to become an astronaut and uncover the mystery of the signal.
Are you ready for an exciting adventure? Your task is to dig the soil and penetrate deeper and deeper until you find the source of the signal. The planet's crust consists of several layers of varying hardness, the mine contains many different metals and precious stones. Collect them - they are needed for crafting and upgrading equipment.
You have to dig quickly as you have a limited supply of oxygen! Improve your tools (pickaxe, drill, dynamite, etc.) to dig even faster!
With a limited supply of oxygen and challenging terrain to navigate, can you become the fastest ground digger and solve the mystery of the signal?
Best of luck!

name: Beast League
description:
A multiplayer sports battle arena where you can defy gravity! Compete in fast-paced 2-minute airborne matches and unlock powerful Beasts with unique super powers.
Experience the first mode of Beast League: Basketball. The ultimate mobile PvP multiplayer basketball game! Control your shots with precision and make insane dunks and layups as you dominate the court. Defy gravity with Nitro Boots, fly and spin in the air as you outplay and defeat your enemy.
Unlock and upgrade a variety of Beasts unique play styles and ultimate abilities! Collect awesome skins to stand out in the field. Battle until the last Beast stands, each time you score your enemy loses HP!

name: Skate Jam
description:
Do you think you have what it takes to be a pro skater? Have you attempted to land new combo tricks and tough grinds? What about warming up for skate competitions? Look no further.

Skate Jam is the ultimate professional skateboarding game designed to master your wildest skate tricks!

Explore different skate parks, unlock new boards and compete in global Skate Jam tournaments to become a skate legend.

name: Solasta: Lightbringers Edition
description:
The Solasta Lightbringers Edition contains:
- Crown of the Magister: The original level 1-12 campaign. From fledgling adventurers to saviours of Masgarth, this 40h+ campaign will take you through the Badlands in search of ancient artifacts to stand against a mysterious threat.
- Palace of Ice: A level 10-16 campaign, it is the continuation of Crown of the Magister and Solasta's last DLC. Venture north into the lands of the Snow Alliance to help your allies and end the Sorak menace once and for all! Also unlocks the Gnome and Tiefling ancestries.
- Lost Valley: A stand-alone level 1-12 campaign. Trapped by accident in an isolated valley where Manacalon's ancient traditions still rule, the party must find a way to escape by allying various factions jumping at each other's throat. Also unlocks an additional subclass for each class.

name: PixelMogul
description:
As the PixelMogul you will start small with a single, simple building but, you know, one day you could own the whole town! It all depends on your talent and fortune as a landlord!
Buy buildings, choose interiors and maintain your apartments in tip top shape to find and keep suitable tenants. But be warned: Only happy tenants will stay put and pay their rent. And only happy tenants will enable you to buy more buildings and expand your real-estate empire!

name: Gravity Still Sucks!
description: Last year, Gravity Sucked. Guess what? Gravity still sucks!

name: Speed X: Extreme 3D Car Racing
description:
Speed X: Extreme 3D Car Racing is one of the most exciting and action-packed 3D Racing Games that allows you to fulfill your most ambitious racing desires! This game lets you steer your car at unimaginable speed, giving you the heart pumping and enthralling experience that you’ve always dreamt of.
The Game consists of 15 different Tournament races and Sprint Rounds, offering you a variety of challenges. The more you win, the more you earn. Outpace your opponents and enhance your racing skills. You can also brag about your advanced driving skills via the Leader boards through Game Center.
You will be rewarded with in-Game Cash on winning races that you can gather to unlock more in the Game. Users who are passionate about racing can use In-App purchase options to gain more points and challenge any race Opponents which they want.

name: Eternal Destiny
description: Eternal Destiny (Or just Destiny) is a first-person shooter originally released on Risc PC (Acorn) machines. You play through a variety of Egyptian, High-Tek Japanese, and Manga-themed levels, discovering power cells and unravelling the story, which revolves around a Time Travel.

name: RGB
description:
Somehow you are in the locked room.
Let's escape from this room by full use of hidden items and your brain.

RGB is my second work of ESCAPER series.
This time, you must escape from the colorful room not kind to eyes.

At first, search items and try to move various objects.
There are important hints and messages hidden in many places, look around again if you are stuck.

name: Floodrush
description:
8 Seekers rush to collect treasure and battle for supremacy! Choose from 3 Seekers, summon a rowdy crew, and dominate the island before it sinks. Surprise your foes by casting rum bombs, nets and exploding watermelons.
Mobilize troops like the muscular Boxer Crab, or invest in heavy troops like the mighty Lava Rex. Swarm and overwhelm others with Pistol Fish, Raptors, and more! Find higher tier cards to build an unstoppable force.

name: PowerWash Simulator: Warhammer 40,000 Content Pack
description: Clean up the Grim Darkness of the Far Future when Warhammer 40,000 comes to PowerWash Simulator. As humanity stands at the edge of what could be its darkest age, could you wash away the grime to reveal a brighter future?

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Update 3.1
description:
In this update you get:
- A new Legendary Hero
- Bretonnia are getting some love with plenty of changes and rebalances.
- The Great Drill of Hashut will strike in a new Chaos Dwarf endgame crisis for Immortal Empires, The Will of Hashut.
- Beef up the lower tiers of infantry with the fourth Regiments of Renown

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Shadows of Change
description: This DLC will add three Legendary Lords (1 for each race), a Legendary Hero and new units.

name: Total War: Warhammer III - Thrones of Decay
description: This DLC will add three Legendary Lords (1 for each race), a Legendary Hero and new units.

name: Sandtrix
description: Blocks turn into sand. Clear pixels by lining up the same continous color from left to right.

name: Echoshift
description:
Experience echoshift originally released on the PSP system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

The Walker’s life is stuck on repeat. Our hero is lost in a series of dangerous, mind-bending mazes, where time keeps replaying, over and over… Do you have the skill to help the Walker escape?

Test your mental agility in 56 levels of puzzle-packed action, where the clock is always ticking as you work to flick switches, unlock doors and overcome obstacles.

Co-operate with ‘echoes’ of your past self to solve problems as you navigate through this ingenious and endlessly addictive puzzle game from 2009.

name: Firewatch: Audio Tour
description: This update adds a commentary mode in which the game’s protagonist goes on a hunt for new tapes that contain the developer’s recollections, anecdotes and more. It also adds a free-roam mode.

name: Lust Campus
description: Lust Campus is a multi-adventure graphic novel with an emphasis on eroticism and intimacy, with with a diverse cast of complex characters with whom you can connect and meet, and who evolve (or not) thanks to your decisions throughout the story. In LC you will find a game with a femenine gaze an empathy driven storytelling.

name: Factory Inc.
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombie Forest 3: Underground
description: Sin descripción

name: Death Park 2: Horror Clown
description: Sin descripción

name: Legendary Master Idle
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Blood: Survival FPS
description: Sin descripción

name: 1MagLeft
description: Sin descripción

name: Gummy Slide
description: Sin descripción

name: Card Shuffle Sort
description: Sin descripción

name: The Thing You Can't Defeat
description:
Experimental mod for Ultimate Doom. Doomguy has dementia. The Thing you can’t Defeat lets you replay the first episode of Ultimate Doom as it slowly morphs into a confusing and demented nightmare.

This WAD was HEAVILY inspired by the WAD “Doom but somethings not right” and the album “Everywhere at the end of time” by The Caretaker.

name: Young Street
description:
Before bipedal apes invented radio receivers, before we exchanged our gills for lungs, there was radio.
Man-made transmissions mutate and extend the electrosphere.

Remember the alien face of nature!

name: The Curse of Aristotle
description: Sin descripción

name: Nuign Specter
description: Sin descripción

name: Real Time Assist Replay Time
description: "Real Time Assist Replay Time" is a slot machine simulator.

name: Grand Theft Auto Online: Heists
description: Heists was a major content update exclusive to Grand Theft Auto Online. It featured a new 4-player cooperative experience for GTA Online, giving players the chance to team up to pull off a string of intense multi-part heists, raids and robberies. Online Heists spanned numerous missions featuring new gameplay, vehicles, weapons, and scenarios to test a team’s full set of skills.

name: Illegal Crime Game
description: Explore the city and commit crimes. Collect money and commit crimes. Pray to your Crime Deity and invade tombs.

name: Lambda
description: This a gzdoom mod that contains all of the weapons and items from Half-Life and Half-Life: Opposing-Force, also includes some extra sutff from other mods to fill the item holes

name: Lambda-Strike
description: This mod was originally just a reskin of Doom, but now is a full port of all the arsenal of counter-strike 1.6 with some extra.

name: Crimen: Mercenary Tales
description:
Raise yer glasses high, me hearties! Embark on a (bloody!) journey through eight swashbucklin' tales of grandeur, riches, and legendary feats!

Slash your way through eerie castles, ancient temples, forsaken shipwrecks, and other astonishing locations while wielding a variety of historically accurate weapons directly from the 17th-century.

Experience visually captivating comic book graphics, while being entertained by the mercenary humor of the tavern’s patrons and their over-the-top achievements.

name: Texas Lane'em Poker
description: Texas Hold'em Poker on 3 different lanes against the dealer.

name: Quoridor
description: The abstract strategy game Quoridor is surprisingly deep for its simple rules. The object of the game is to advance your pawn to the opposite edge of the board. On your turn you may either move your pawn or place a wall. You may hinder your opponent with wall placement, but not completely block them off. Meanwhile, they are trying to do the same to you. The first pawn to reach the opposite side wins.

name: Taiwan 2001
description: Taiwan 2001 is a Japanese parody of the unlicensed SNES game Hong Kong 97. The game was released by Kuso Soft in 2001 and is based around the political status of Taiwan regarding if it is it's own country or a part of China.

name: Golem Arcana
description: Golem Arcana offers a whole new way to play tabletop games by harnessing the power of your smartphone or tablet. As you play, the app serves as a sort of referee and rulebook, freeing up the players to concentrate on devising strategies to crush their enemies and give grief to their friends on the other side of the table. Thus, Golem Arcana combines the tactile fun of a tabletop game with the accessibility of an online game. It’s the best of both worlds, offering up a unique experience that neither could deliver on its own.

name: High Like a Fly
description:
It probably looks like yet another Flappy Bird clone, but in this game you navigate the fly by swiping your finger instead of tapping.
It is much more difficult than it seems.

name: Siegecraft Defender Zero
description:
Build your own castle defense and protect the Knights from the evil Lizardmen!
It’s Siegecraft built from the ground up for TD fans!

name: Postman Runner
description:
Proof yourself in role of a postman in a race against the clock.
Compete with other players.
Customize your character.
3d game.
Control:
Tilt your device to move your character to the side and dodge obstacles.
Sweep throw newspaper.

name: Ion Racer
description: Exploding into the app store at warp speed, SGN brings you Ion Racer! A sci-fi, action-packed, agility race with heart-stopping thrills - Ion Racer takes speed to another level. With endless ways to customize your craft, you'll never run the same race twice. Experience the mounting challenge of mission-based progressive competition - how long can you stay in the race?

name: Viking Age
description: Sin descripción

name: 7 Card Studs
description:
7 Card Studs is a free solitaire and multiplayer strategic board game using poker hands. Challenge yourself or a friend to a free poker based board game!
The board is 7x7 and has 49 squares. 13 cards start face down on the board and are not revealed until all the other cards are placed.

The goal of the game is to make the best 5 card poker hands in each row and column. Every row and column has 7 cards, but only the best 5 will be used.

When playing solitaire the player scores the points in both the rows and the columns.
In multiplayer head to head mode, player 1 plays the rows and player 2 plays the columns in a head to head show down on the same board.

name: Koongya Draw Party
description: New drawing quiz game “Koongya Draw Party” coming soon!

name: Star Detective
description:
Star Detective follows a detective who gets a missing person case from a child that wish to a shooting star for help.

It's a simple game where you walk around and talk to people. The game is mostly story focus but you do get to meet some friendly faces as you help a child find their friend.

name: Assassin's Creed Mirage: Launch Edition
description:
In the ninth century CE, Baghdad is at its height, leading the world in science, art, innovation, and commerce. Amid its bustling urban landscape, a conflicted young orphan with a tragic past must navigate the streets to survive.
In Assassin’s Creed Mirage, you are Basim, a cunning street thief with nightmarish visions, seeking answers and justice. After an act of deadly retribution, Basim flees Baghdad and joins an ancient organization – The Hidden Ones. As he learns their mysterious rituals and powerful tenets, he will hone his unique abilities, discover his true nature, and come to understand a new Creed – one that will change his fate in ways he never could have imagined.

name: Grisaia: Chronos Rebellion
description: The newest installment in the Grisaia visual novel series. All of the girls from Mihama, past and present, must face off against a new evil terrorist organization in an all-out war.

name: Emerald Wasp
description:
Operation Rassvet was a model of surprise.

It started as an intelligence operation and ended up becoming one of the most mysterious disappearences to these days. None of the members were found. Forgotten by the world, the last survivor is hiding in the shadows...

name: Orly Kuukou Satsujin Jiken
description: Kanae and Akina went to France for the first time abroad and got involved in a murder case. A Southern Tourist tour operator is killed, and Kanae follows the victim's schedule from arrival to Paris till return.

name: Misty
description: You are a high school student. One day your classmate Miyuki suddenly loses his memory. An investigation leads to his girlfriend who suspiciously disappeared a year ago.

name: Shadow Hunter
description: A famous writer announces her engagement and starts to receive threats and gets blackmailed. The main character is a detective tasked with identifying the stalker. As the investigation proceeds, a murder occurs.

name: Tawhid
description: Year 2031. Main character is a 28-year old ex-operative photographer who travels around the world while taking pictures of ruins destroyed by war. A 12-year old girl who joined you in Egypt is being chased by a secret organization and even the farthest corners of ruins around the world won't stop them.

name: Linkage
description: Somehow you are in the locked dark room. Escape from here by finding items and using your brain. This time you are locked in the dark concrete room. Explore the room, find and use items, solve riddles and escape from here!

name: Sign
description: Somehow, you are trapped in a locked room. Explore the room and get hidden items, solve riddles and escape from here. "Sign" is created for WebGL testing as an alternative to Flash, but 3D unique riddles are included, you might be able to enjoy unusual escape.

name: Oddrietta
description: 3 days ago, 22 year old Henrietta was getting ready for work when she received a message from her mother: "Don't go out, the wind is changing people...". A mysterious wind appeared out of nowhere and if someone listens to it, they start to change: some get holes and pimples all over their body, some become grotesque abominations. Henrietta became deaf after a car accident 9 years ago, so she isn't affected by the wind... but she can't stay home forever. What's going on out there? What is that wind? Is Henrietta's mother okay?

name: British Horror Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Mungyodance
description: Mungyodance is the first game in the Mungyodance series. It is a rhythm game that features 167 songs, and has an overall simpler feel than the two succeeding games in the series.

name: Darkland 3
description: DARKLAND is a fun retro-style platform game! Our protagonist, the shadow hero, must cross the valley to find the key to open the portal. There are dangers along the way, pay attention to the traps on the head and the spikes under the feet. Step on the enemy and destroy them, being careful not to fall off the cliff. The game has 50 levels. Wish you have a good time!

name: The Wired Action Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: The FMV Collection 3
description: Sin descripción

name: The FMV Collection 1
description: Sin descripción

name: The FMV Collection 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Outbreak Ultimate Apocalypse
description: Enter the world of survival horror with the Outbreak Ultimate Apocalypse bundle! Featuring Outbreak: Lost Hope, Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles, Outbreak: The New Nightmare and Outbreak at a great price! Can you survive the nightmare?

name: Infected Cowboys Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Mungyodance 2
description: Mungyodance 2 is the second entry in the Mungyodance series. The game include almost every song from the first game, with an additional 295 new songs.

name: Mungyodance 3: The Third Rave
description: Mungyodance 3: The Third Rave is the final entry in the Mungyodance series. The game features over 780 songs, including some from previous games.

name: Mungyodance Final
description: Mungyodance Final is a cancelled forth entry in the Mungyodance series. The game was teased on Twitter by Emma Essex in 2013 and was later confirmed cancelled in a 2015 post on her Reddit.

name: Spyro: Ripto Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Poker Masters
description: Learn the intricacies of each variant, develop your strategies and learn to read your opponents. All the complexity of real poker is here, with tips and tutorials to get new players into the game.

name: Speed Demons
description:
Speed Demons is a racing video game released in 1999. The game was developed and published by Microïds.

The game has 6 vehicles with possible localised damage, with three possible points of view. The game can be played as single player, 2 player split-screen, or by up to 6 players on a network. There are 10 circuits in varying locations, such as American motorways, on the sides of a volcano during its eruption and snow-covered ski slopes.

name: Flif
description:
Baby angels save the world from drought! Bonky glidey flappy physics platforming! Explore clouds & sky ruins & collect raindrops!

Commissioned for Indiepocalypse #38.

name: Notes of Hearts
description: In a world of fantasy and magic, you are a rising strategician unraveling the mysterious magical events occurring all over the world. You are free to choose your gender as well as your species, which ranges from Human, Canine, Feline, Avian, Dragon and Fae. You will meet many characters, most of which anthropomorphic in your adventure who you may befriend or seek a deeper connection with. There are multiple romance options not bound by species or gender.

name: Farming Simulator 22: Hay & Forage Pack
description:
Rule fields, mountains, and hills with specialized machines to maximize hay and forage resources! All 17 authentic machines in the Hay & Forage Pack make your farming-life easier and more fun.

New brands: Brielmaier, REFORM & Reiter
Also included: KRONE, PÖTTINGER, Rigitrac & Sepp Knüsel
Specialized tractors like the Rigitrac SKH 60 with a slope-compensating cabin
Precise mowers for grassland operations, even with side shift functionality
Ideal ground adjustment thanks to the unique design of the Reiter RESPIRO mergers
Easy transport with loading wagons like the modular REFORM PrimAlpin

name: Road of Fury
description: Sin descripción

name: Skyrama
description: Sin descripción

name: SSX Snowboarder
description: Get off the couch and onto the slopes with this cool Play TV SSX Snowboarder set. Just plug the unit into your TV or VCR and hop on the board for some real snowboarding action. Your moves on the snowboard control the action as you cruise SSX courses and perform heart-stopping tricks as you become one of your favorite SSX characters. You can almost feel the powder as you watch and hear the realistic graphics and sounds on the screen.

name: Ziggy
description: Sin descripción

name: Goodgame Farmer
description: Sin descripción

name: Goodgame Farm Fever
description: Sin descripción

name: Alerta Vermelho
description: Alerta Vermelho is a game where you need attack the enemy planet using the lasers and bombs you have and, at the same time, defend yourself.

name: Paintball Racers
description: Sin descripción

name: Gunfight
description: Gunfight is an unofficial port of the classic Atari VCS game where a cowboy at either side of the screen, moving up and down for the Sinclair ZX81.

name: Polaris
description: Sin descripción

name: Muteki-Ou Tri-Zenon
description: Sin descripción

name: Peter Pan
description: Sin descripción

name: Scramble
description: Sin descripción

name: Combate
description: Combate is a bundle that includes five action games released by Ciberne Software.

name: Black, White and Grey
description: Paige, a girl currently attending university in her hometown, discovers that someone has been following her. Strange noises come from around the house at night, and it seems that danger is near. Everyone's trying to keep their secrets, but circumstances force them to reveal more and more. Who will prevail in the end? It's all up to you.

name: Crap Game Compilation 2
description:
“Crappy games are better when they're all in one place.”
A compilation of flash games by JonBro originally on Newgrounds

name: Solar Descent
description:
Solar Descent is a WIP action-adventure game (playable tech demo available below) for the Playdate handheld console in the vein of classic The Legend of Zelda games combined with modern ideas found in e.g. Dark Souls and Hollow Knight.

Solar Descent features real-time combat, two attack buttons, on the fly switching of abilities, clever combat integration of the crank, elaborate menus and map systems.

name: The Riftbreaker: Into The Dark
description: Explore an entirely new area of Galatea 37 in this Story Campaign expansion for The Riftbreaker. Catalog new species. Craft new and unique weapons. Fight hordes of aliens, unlike anything you've seen before.

name: Golf With Your Friends: Pizza Party Pack
description: Grab a slice and become the life of the party with the new Golf With Your Friends Pizza Party Pack DLC. Put your drinks hat on and get the boombox playing with this brand new set of cosmetics, including stickers, hats, trails and floaties.

name: Casca a Cobra
description: Casca a Cobra is a strategy game where you need to chase a snake and eat its body up to the head.

name: Centopeia
description: Centopeia is a shooter game where you are the operator of the earth's defense bases, with the mission of frustrating the attack of the terrible fleet of space centipedes that want to conquer our planet.

name: Sucuri
description: Sin descripción

name: Bichos & Cia
description: Bichos & Cia is a bundle that includes five games released by Ciberne Software.

name: Drainscape
description: Drainscape is a vertical action adventure with roguelite elements, where you must survive your fall through a drain filled with obstacles and enemies with only an umbrella to save you.

name: The Lost & Forgotten
description:
There are cases of disappearances around him.

People will forget about someone, forget their name, and then their existence will be forgotten. That person will disappear. They are 'lost'.

Nikk, a sixth-grader, has a father who locked him up at home after school. He despised him. He thought that there were people that should just disappear.

And if there's someone that he doesn't want to disappear from the world, it's his dear friend, Rea.

name: Slime Roll
description:
Our game, developed for the Mini Jam, embraces the theme of Fusion and incorporates the required limitation of "Control the Environment." In this fast-paced and creative adventure, players will dive into a world where the fusion of objects and abilities takes center stage.

As the player explores various levels, they will encounter unique objects and elements that can be fused together to create powerful synergies. With the ability to control the environment, players can manipulate and combine these objects to overcome obstacles and navigate through challenging puzzles.

To navigate the game world, players will utilize the classic WASD controls for movement, providing a smooth and intuitive experience. Additionally, they will harness the power of fusion through the use of special abilities. Pressing the spacebar allows the character to perform a dynamic jump, while the Q key activates a heavy ability with tremendous impact. For explosive situations, players can unleash the fused power by pressing the E key.

Our game truly embodies the theme of Fusion by emphasizing the combination of objects and abilities to overcome obstacles and solve puzzles. With the limitation of "Control the Environment," players are encouraged to think creatively and strategically to manipulate their surroundings and forge their path to victory.

Join us in this thrilling adventure, where fusion and environmental control are the keys to success. Can you master the art of fusion and conquer the challenges that lie ahead? Get ready to experience a game that pushes the boundaries of creativity and control in the Mini Jam!

name: Return of the Ancients
description: A mod for Subnautica which brings quite a few ancient wonders back to life, with more lurking beyond what little you can see...

name: The Garden of Banan
description: Little Timmy has found himself lost at his kindergarten I mean preschool. You must find Little Timmy before he- well, dies I guess? Just find your kid man idk

name: Akahane Academy
description:
It's back to school after the break!! Your club leader is acting stranger than usual? The teacher is going crazy, and three new boys who are dying to meet you!!

Well, the teacher is always like that... But why is everyone being so weird today?!

These new boys seem to like you...
And by like, I mean it.

name: Race Day
description:
Race against friends or random opponents!
Race Day is a fun and physics based real-time multiplayer racing game. Compete with up to four players for the top spot. Races are short and intense, perfect for a quick multiplayer game whenever you have a short break! Increase your skill level to unlock new cars and addons.

name: Iron Runner Robot
description:
Check out this fun and futuristic Iron robot running game.
Run, jump and shoot energy balls with this this fun running game. Fun for all ages and a blast to play.

name: Speed Kayak
description:
Control your kayak and go as far as you can!
Achieve the highest score you can!

name: Drifty Chase
description: Imagine that you just robbed a bank and the police is on your tail. Jump into a car and try to shake off the pursuit! This game is not about racing, it’s about drifting with a trunk full of cash through an insanely crowded city! You are being chased by the police that wants to get back each cent from the stolen money bag. Don’t let them take it back from you! Test your skills, drift across the city and find out if you can be faster than them. Let the drifty chase begin!

name: Cliff Drift
description:
Thrilling racing, Cliff Drift!
Drive with the faulty steering wheel and enjoy the pleasure of cliff racing.
Drive carefully, don't fall off the cliff!
Very easy control!
Try to the challenge sports cars, trucks and police cars!

name: Drift Car Driving Simulator
description:
Take control of some amazing drift cars (speed car, SUV and 4x4) in a huge driving environment ready to explore, with a big city, forests, canyons, hills and mountains : more than 16 km² of area and 30 km of roads !
Drive fast and drift hard on 8 amazing different tracks.

name: Neon Flytron: Cyberpunk Flight
description:
Find yourself driving a flying car, speeding through the cyberpunk city!
Dive into this fascinating neon world! Dodge traffic and moving bridges, fly between trains, and through giant fans. Use a shield to avoid obstacles. Watch neon signs passing by your side, while you rush forward.
Many dangers lie ahead, but you can do it! Prove yourself and become the best pilot in cyberpunk city!

name: Pixsteps: Gamified Pedometer
description:
Get ready to step into a cozy world with Pixsteps, the pedometer that mixes activity with creativity.
Take charge of your very own Garden, a special place that blooms and grows with every step you take. Whether you're walking or running, each little step will bring new life to your plants, animals, and rewards. Get Pixsteps and kickstart a virtuous cycle of wellness and healthy habits!

name: AFPS: Airplane Flight Pilot Sim
description: Take flight in real airplanes across the massively detailed open-world flight simulator. Explore sceneries and airports in high resolution with satellite maps, 3D buildings, runways, air traffic, weather conditions, and true volumetric clouds.

name: Flying Car Transport Simulator
description: Drive hi-tech flying cars in the all-new exciting car driving simulator game. Drive fast cars down city streets or fly high in the sky above the city like an airplane. Help pick up taxi fares in the latest in taxi driving experiences, fly passengers in style in the best of flying cars. The latest in driving and flying simulations with one of the best flying car games on the store!

name: My Land
description: My Land is a farming simulation game from the maker of My Planet, My Business Empire, and My Colony. You begin the game with a blank plot of land and 00. From there, it is up to you to make it your own. You can create a farm with crops and animals, or you can create a commerce area with side walks and pizza stands, or you can create a nature park with lakes and trails. The choice is yours!

name: Block Racer
description: Can you beat all your friends and show them who is the retro arcade hero.

name: UFB 2: Fight & Wrestling Games
description: The Ultra Fighting Bros have company in UFB 2! Discover the all-new CAREER mode and fight your way in 50 bone-breaking challenges and combats against fighters from all around the world. The greatly improved multiplayer mode is also sure to get you and your friends hooked from the first punch. Step inside the arena, it’s time to fight!

name: Atari Tabletops Collection #1
description:
In a parallel universe, Atari made physical tabletops/Game & Watch games from their biggest hits from VCS and Jaguar consoles. The best thing is that they also put them out as a Lynx compilation...

This was an entry into the AC2016 24 hour coding contest.

Includes Egglords and Tempeggs.

name: Rompechanchitos
description: Rompechanchitos (lit. "piggy bank breaker") is an interactive guide about the current pension system in Chile (as of 2021) and its consequences.

name: Spirits Mirror​:​ Digital Possessed
description:
A spirit reflects
The visions you see
Shifting divisions
Between you & me

name: Terrapy
description: Terrapy introduces the player to the complexity of caring for houseplants. Each plant requires its own unique accommodations and will react accordingly to the player’s selections. As is such when caring for each other, Terrapy illustrates the costs and benefits of personal choice and free will within a wholesome environment, integrating horticulture to nurture empathy and growth.

name: Yoshi's Island PC
description: Yoshi's Island PC is a fan made 2D platformer based on the Yoshi's Island series that was released on Mario Fan Games Galaxy by Emma Essex in the early 2000s and later rereleased in the Early 2000s FANGAME HELL collection.

name: Cyber Soldier
description: Fast-paced competitive online multiplayer and offline survival mode, guns and overpowered skills, you and getting cash!

name: Stray Doom
description: Stray's cat rips and tears through demonic hordes in brilliant upcoming Doom mod This mod lets you play as the cat from Stray in the original Doom, and you can shoot your way through the game as the cat. But not only that, but you will be playing in third-person.

name: Assassin's Creed Unity: Arno's Chronicles
description: Assassin's Creed Unity: Arno's Chronicles is a mobile 2D platformer set in France released in June 2017.

name: Zombie TD
description: Zombie TD pits you against wave after wave of zombies. Build, maintain and upgrade towers to hold off the zombie hordes over the course of 4 grueling days. The game is set in city streets and the player must construct towers to fend off wave after wave of zombie. Each tower can be equipped with a variety of weapons. The further the player makes it in the game, the better the weapons (anything from arrows to grenade launchers). Just as the weapons get better, so do the zombies. The difficulty level grows as the game goes on and so must the players ability to work with the tools and weapons given to him or her.

name: Halloweeen!
description: Innovative two-button platformer that starts dead simple, but gets devilishly hard! Upgrade your abilities, unlock new candies, enemies, streets and hats as you go trick or treating. Can you level-up to 20 and beat your friends on the Game Center leaderboards?

name: Mahjong Yin And Yang
description: In the ancient Chinese philosophy of Yin and Yang has always symbolized the light and dark, hard and soft. Mahjong Yin and Yang you will find symbolize characters. Chips Water and Fire, rain and snow, as well as other pieces will pleasantly surprise you. Great atmosphere, nice music it's nice to spend time with the game Mahjong Yin Yang

name: Holiday Dash!
description:
You've been waiting all year to open presents and the time is finally near. Now, the only obstacle remaining is to return home.
Run, jump, and ride your sleigh as fast as you can while slinging snowballs, because it’s a guarantee someone or something will stand in your way! Can you make it home?

name: Pixel Disc Golf 2
description: The disc golf phenomenon of the 2014 is now back and better than ever!

name: Family Tetris
description: Family Tetris is a plug and play Tetris game released in the fall of 2006.

name: Pokémon Yellow: Cramorant Edition
description: A ROM hack of Pokemon Yellow which replaces Pikachu with Cramorant! Many other major and minor changes have been made to create a new Pokemon Yellow experience. This project aims to provide a different way to enjoy Yellow while adding more variety to the game, all while staying mostly true to the Pokemon Generation 1 experience. This hack was created using the Pokemon Yellow disassembly as a base.

name: Escape From Russia: Mobilization
description: Originally russian runner, in which you have to find yourself in the shoes of a poor piglet, running away from the military commissar with a agenda.

name: Tribute
description: Tribute is a 3v3 battle arena with the core gameplay built around on-field heroes switching, strategic points capturing, and lane-pushing control.

name: Biohazard i Survivor
description: Sin descripción

name: Resident Evil: Confidential Report
description: Sin descripción

name: Dora the Explorer: 3D Driving Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: The Planets
description: Sin descripción

name: Red Clash
description: Vertical space shooter

name: Minna to Biohazard Clan Master
description: Sin descripción

name: TimeQuake
description: Time is your weapon in this online PVP first-person team shooter. Opposing factions bend time to take out opponents, complete objectives and dominate the battlefield.

name: Pongo17
description:
In Pongo17, players represent godesses Midori(Nature) and Kuroyuri(Chaos), and they must defend their core crystal from a bouncing ball representing the original information.
As they move their paddles left and right, they not only defend their crystals but also modify the original information of the ball.
Along the way, they can collect power-ups symbolizing the different forces at play in this eternal struggle.
These power-ups have varying effects and can tip the balance in favor of one side or the other.

name: ReplaceR
description: It's a 2D action shooting adventure game where you switch between multiple guns and use interchangeable gimmicks to try to break through the stages! What awaits you in a mysterious facility in a corner of the universe?

name: Goose-A-Gotchi
description:
Why did gramps send me this goose? Why is it so angry? Maybe we can become friends?

*Made for Game Boy Showdown 2023!*

name: The Pact
description: A puzzle-platformer. Two enemies have to become friends and help each other in order to survive. Switch between them and resolve the puzzles to reach the end of each level.

name: What Friends Are For
description: What Friends Are For is a puzzle platformer for the original Game Boy. It was developed in GB Studio for Game Boy Showdown 2023. Switch between friendly and unfriendly modes to use your enemies to solve puzzles and platforming challenges... or are they your friends? The game features 5 unique levels lovingly made in a week by Shin, with an awesome dynamic soundtrack from Beatscribe.

name: My Friendly Little Island
description: My Friendly Little Island is a cute game about personal growth and making friends. It starts out as a slow, simplistic adventure game. However, with every new skill you unlock, the game’s dynamics change more and more into a fast-paced platformer.

name: The Avengers: The Mobile Game
description:
The Avengers: The Mobile Game is an action game based on the 2012 movie of the same name. Loki has come to earth to conquer it with the help of an alien race known as the Chitauri.

In the game the player takes control of Iron Man, Captain America, Thor and the Hulk. The game is a 2D side scrolling beat 'em up where the player each level controls a different hero. Along way Avenger badges can be collected, each badges 100 earns the player an extra live. Health can also be replenished. The levels of Iron Man, Captain America and the Hulk take place on the ground while Thor fly’s through the sky in his levels. Some sections involve climbing and the Hulk can pick up objects that can be hurled at enemies.

name: Retro Quiz Tower
description:
You find a mysterious tower while wandering through the forest. You go in to investigate and discover that it is the Retro Quiz Tower. Inside are monsters which are not violent and the only thing they are interested in is Retro. They will test you to show if you know more than them and if so you will get their friendship.
You will be able to overcome all the questions and complete the... Retro Tower Quiz Trial!

name: Assassin's Creed Syndicate: Limited Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: O Jardim Magico 3
description: The magic class helps to consolidate the knowledge acquired in School in a fun way. Facilitates learning and prepares the child for new challenges. Portuguese Language, Mathematics, Fun holidays, Junior Graphics, and Who knows, knows!, Recess.

name: The Last of Us Part II: Grounded Update
description:
This title update adds Grounded and Permadeath as modes.

It adds the following new graphics, audio, and gameplay modifiers:
- Mirror World
- Mirror on Death
- Slow Motion
- Bullet Speed mode
- Infinite Ammo
- Infinite Crafting
- Infinite Melee Durability
- Infinite Listen mode Range
- One Shot
- Touch of Death
- 8-bit Audio
- 4-bit Audio
- Helium Audio
- Xenon Audio

It also adds the following new options and improvements:
- Saves now display playtime up to the second
- Film Grain Adjustment option
- Disable Listen Mode option
- Motion Sensor Function Aiming option
- Arc Throw HUD Display option
- Aiming Acceleration Scale option
- Aiming Ramp Power Scale option
- Accessibility improvements to Ground Zero encounter, collectible tracking, Enhanced Listen Mode for collectibles, and rope gameplay

name: Insert Title Here
description: This "game" hasn't got any story or plot, any characters, any enemies ... "Insert Title Here" is an interactive experiment in which you will decide what path to choose, how to react ... something innovative which is always nice to try. This experiment will play with you, "talk" with you and put you into a mix of various game genres.

name: Witch Trainer
description: Miss Granger has become a headache for Professor Snapes, and next to this one you will try to "put in waist" to this one, developing not only his personal growth but also affecting other characters such as Snapes, Harry or Ginny, although these are only mentioned.​

name: MonoGolf
description:
Monogolf is a mini golf game where your objective is to get the ball in the hole in just one hit. If you don't, you'll lose a heart. You start the game with only 10 hearts, so you'll have to make sure you don't lose too many or else you'll lose the game.

To hit the ball in Monogolf, all you have to do is slide your finger back to adjust the power and the direction of your hit. Before you let go, you'll have to keep a couple important factors in mind, like the different surfaces the ball will roll over and how that will affect your shot, or the walls it can bounce off of, and so on.

In Monogolf, you'll find more than 100 different levels which you can unlock as you beat the easier levels in the beginning. Each time you beat a level, you'll get some orange hexagons (the game's currency) that you can then use to increase the maximum number of lives you have or get other useful abilities.

If 100 levels isn't enough, there's also a scenario editor so you can create your own. Once you create a level, you can send it to the developers on Twitter. The best ones will appear in the game.

Monogolf is an excellent mini golf game with nice graphics, relaxing music, and a simple, fun, and addictive gameplay.

name: Muppets Sorting and Ordering
description: Sorting & Ordering is a Muppet Kids CD-Rom game produced by Brighter Child in 1997. This game is volume 6 in the Muppet Kids Reading and Thinking Series.

name: Donald Fuck
description: Sin descripción

name: Cursed to Golf
description: Cursed to Golf is a 2D golf-like adventure about surviving through golfing purgatory. With rogue-like elements and Metroid-like hole layouts, can you ascend?

name: Become A History Explorer
description: My First Amazing History Explorer (aka Tidsmaskinen, Become a History Explorer) is a video game published in 1998 on Windows by DK Multimedia, Norstedts Rabén Multimedia. It's an educational game, set in a history and fantasy themes.

name: Become A science Explorer
description: Become A Science Explorer involves 8 different activities, 20 experiments to print off and try, brilliant graphics and 8 fun worksheets! You can also take the ultimate science test in the Bright Sparks Quiz!

name: Hugo: The Magic Oak
description:
Hugo: The Magic Oak or The Magic Oak is a 1998 video game developed and published by ITE Media for the PC as part of the "Play and Learn" series. It was titled Den Fortryllede Eg / Hugo: Leg Og Lær 1 in Denmark, Tajemný les (Mystic forest) in Czechia, Taikatammi in Finland, Die Zaubereiche in Germany, Zaczarowany dąb in Poland, and Кузя и его друзья: Волшебное дерево (Kuzya and friends: The magic tree) in Russia.

Originally released on 1 June 1998, the game was re-released on 21 April 2005 as Hugo Gold III in Germany. It was also re-released as part of the compilations Hugo 2 in 1 and Hugo - Sonderpaket 1 (with a beach wristwatch) together with Wild River in 1999 in Germany, Hugo: Birthday Party in 2000, and in the Best of Hugo series with Hugo Classic #1 (Hugo) in Denmark.

name: Puzzle by Nikoli W Yajilin
description: Draw lines through the centers of cells to make a loop, and paint cells black in this original Nikoli puzzle. It's immensely satisfying to see how the lines and black cells all come together to form a solution, and figuring out how to draw the loop isn't as easy as it might seem.

name: Fritz: Don't Call Me a Chess Bot
description: Play chess with interactive hints and tips

name: Sweet Dreams
description: A short horror visual novel where you're starting to feel a bit sleepy on the train. Will you find friendship? Or will you find trouble...

name: IShoot
description: iShoot is an artillery combat game in which tanks blast each other with a wide range of high-powered weapons, from basic shells and cluster bombs to the world-destroying Shiva Bomb.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scribes of Fate
description: The Elder Scrolls Online: Scribes of Fate is a DLC for The Elder Scrolls Online. It is the 29th DLC released for the game and continues the year-long Shadow Over Morrowind adventure along with Update 37. Its release date is March 13th, 2023 for PC and Mac, and March 28th, 2023 for Xbox and PlayStation.

name: LEGO Ninjago: Spinjitzu Smash
description: Sin descripción

name: I'll Invaligate your Aid
description: A short game where the antagonist is a lovely girl that doesn't want you to play.

name: Hi, How Are You
description: Hi, How Are You is a 3D platformer based on the art and music of the late Daniel Johnston, and starring his well-known character, Jerimiah the Innocent. Jerimiah has been transformed into a frog by an evil force and must reverse the curse to rescue the love of his life. Help him regain his true form by outrunning, outsmarting, and outmaneuvering his enemies through increasingly tough obstacles in a bizarre, otherworldly universe. It's not enough just to find the exit — Jerimiah has to hop on every green square in the stage to open the way forward, and each labyrinthine level contains special bonus squares as well. With 40 different stages and 4 different forms, you've got your work cut out for you!

name: Candy Crush Saga
description: An Adobe Flash port of Candy Crush Saga that was playable on Facebook until it was replaced by a HTML5 version when Flash was discontinued.

name: Guitar Hero 7
description: Guitar Hero 7 is a cancelled 7th entry in the Guitar Hero series.

name: Project: Playtime - Phase 2: Incineration
description: Phase 2 is finally here! The horrors continue with an all-new map along with a host of new terrifying monster skins, and intricate survivor skins. Phase 2 also expands on gameplay with new puzzles, a UI overhaul, and a slough of quality of life upgrades.

name: Magic Stone Knights
description: Embark on a thrilling adventure of destiny with unique and charming allies!

name: Rocket Crane
description:
Rockets are cool...
Cranes are cool...
How about a Rocket powered Crane?...Bring it on!
Master the art of flying a Rocket Crane, then use your skill to solve complex construction puzzles.

name: Idle Military Factory Tycoon
description:
As workstations are built, you will grow your business and raise even more cash.
Automate the workflow by hiring operators so that products are automatically sold.
Hire the best operator, manage your money and become a great manager.

name: Lazy Master
description:
Right now! It takes only 5 minutes!
Log in and grab various rewards that await you!
It’s so easy upgrading your heroes in Lazy Master!

name: Puppy Moon
description:
Dogs in space! Dogs in space!
An adorable dog is jumping on the moon looking for its missing master.
Jump further and further!
Collect coins, bones and complete the missions to unlock more dogs.

name: Eperon Defend
description: This time you have to protect the Eperon planet from the meteors, which are incoming.

name: GlowBoard: WinterFest
description: Sin descripción

name: Neko Secret Homecoming Light
description: Explore Neko Town looking for hidden objects. Walk down the streets, find new places to get in. Try a variety of mini games like playing darts, picking locks, breaking safes! Try changing your style using character customization. Finally, find the way to get to the anime factory and hack all its computer's data!

name: Letter To A Friend
description: Letter To A Friend is a short first-person experience by Christoph Frey about the unspeakable horror that creeps up on you at a nightly train station. Its visual references come from expressionistic silent movies and old analog recordings. The game was made in 48 hours during Asylum Jam 2015 and is a proof of concept regarding the visual aesthetics and atmosphere.

name: Million Shells
description:
Manage 15 cannons attached to a huge battleship
and shoot down the enemies that appear.
This is an exhilarating tower defense shooting game!

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou is an expanded port of the 2014 collection, with all nineteen console arcs, the three Hou exclusive arcs, Hajisarashi-hen, and the Oyashiro Quiz.

name: G-Mode Archives 47: 12Gems
description:
The time left is only one night.
Save the world with the power hidden in 12 types of GEM.
