"12GEMs" is an RPG that uses the power hidden in 12 types of GEMs (jewels) and travels while summoning partners sealed in each GEM.

The beginning of the story is the aerial castle "Ganseld" floating in the sky with the power of GEM.
The people living in Ganseld chose themselves as noble people, and the lower world on earth was taught as a place where unclean people and horrible monsters wandered around, and they lived without involvement.

However, one day, the GEM that supported Ganseld suddenly scattered to the uncurled ground.
In order to prevent the castle from falling, the main character, the boy "Dino", received the order of collecting GEM and went to the lower world, but it was a mysterious and mysterious world that was different from what was taught in Ganzeldo ...

Until Ganzeld crashed, there was only one night left. The fate of the world was entrusted to a boy.

name: G-Mode Archives 46: Keitai Shoujo: Koi+Hime - Koi ni Ochita Cinderella-hime
description:
Those shoes are cursed if a fake wears...? A princess romance adventure in a sound novel style.

When I woke up, I was alone in the dark wilderness. In the bag I was holding, there were dolls and glass shoes...

The main character with glass shoes is attacked by a "masked man" on the way and escapes from his life, and meets a girl.
In the house where she lives, there are girls with familiar faces...

"Mobile Phone Girl - Love + Princess - Princess Cinderella Who Fell in Love" is a love simulation "Mobile Phone Girl" Gaiden work. It is a princess-like romance adventure game in a sound novel format that incorporates romantic comedy x suspense x moe elements in the Grimm's fairy tale "Cinderella" that everyone knows.

Among the heroines, the story revolves around "Sayo Tomoe" which has a quiet and mysterious atmosphere.
The main character "Hiro Aida" is attracted to her and gets involved in a certain incident.
Please enjoy the mysterious and glamorous world that is a bit different from the brilliant youth story depicted in the previous work.

name: G-Mode Archives 45: Chura-umi Monogatari
description:
A time of peace spun by the gentle sea breeze. An Okinawa life experience for those who are tired of modern times.

Chura-umi Monogatari" is a sequel to the game "Chura-jima Kurashi" that simulates life on the southern island.

The stage of this work is a small island "Kotsubu Island" floating in the beautiful sea. The main character, who is tired of living in the city, decided to move after seeing an article on "Recruitment of Administrators of Kotsubu Island" on the Internet.

You will spend a five-day trial period on this island where calm time flows.

At "Kotsubu Island", you can deepen friendship by deepening exchanges with residents, fall in love, and enjoy various leisure (mini-games) such as "Eisa", "Yashi Fruit" and "Snorkeling".
When you finish 5 days, the ending will change depending on the favorability of the residents and the degree of achievement such as mini-games.

A time of peace spun by the gentle sea breeze. Please enjoy your own southern island life.

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Origin
description: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Origin is a DLC that adds an origin reading mode, a new game opening, sprite switching, and Mehagashi-hen from Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Hou+.

name: Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future
description: Blaze Union: Story to Reach the Future Remaster is a high-definition remaster of the fantasy strategy RPG first released for PSP in May 2010. In addition high-definition visuals, the updated release offers improved operability and tempo, useful features like rewind and auto-save, and various other adjustments that make gameplay more pleasant.

name: Fall of the New Age: Collector's Edition
description: Find your little brother in this adventure!

name: Vivitter for Nintendo Switch
description: Who's the Chicken?! Introducing a party game that measures your fear level! Online battles for up to 10 players! More than 30 mini-games to test your courage!

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed 2: Turbocharged
description: The world’s raddest cars are back and taking the fun to the next level! Race over 130 vehicles with crazy new mechanics and even more vehicle types. Plus, build your tracks with stunning new environments and different game modes to have fun off and online!

name: G-Mode Archives+: Saiko Mystery Series vol. 1 - Three, Mittsu no Kioki
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibugawa Ryousuke Jiken-bo vol.11 - Ane no Kabe
description: Sin descripción

name: G-Mode Archives+: Tantei Kibukawa Ryousuke Jiken-bo vol.12 - Nakanai Irainjin
description: Their cries reach no one. In a distorted cage, they quietly await the hand of salvation.

name: G-Mode Archives+: Todo Ryuunosuke Tantei Nikki vol.1 - Kohakuiro no Igon: Seiyou Karuta Renzoku Satsujin Jiken
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Take the plunge into endless fun and excitement with Pool Together - the ultimate pool game experience!

description: Sin descripción

name: The Case of the Golden Idol: Spider of Lanka Bundle
description:
Discover clues surrounding 12 strange and gruesome deaths and build your own theory. Pick your suspect, deduce the motive, unmask the awful truth.

Step into the shoes of an 18th century detective and uncover the mystery behind twelve strange deaths spanning 50 years, all somehow connected. Unmask the true killers in this sprawling narrative and discover their devious motives.

Featuring a brand new expansion
Set in the fictional Kingdom of Lanka, this DLC offers three brand new scenarios that will demand the utmost of your deduction powers to unravel.

Encounter characters old and new during your expedition to Lanka. Among these faces hides the Spider of Lanka, puppeteering events to shape the future

name: Super No One Lives Under the Lighthouse
description: Sin descripción

name: Namariel Legends: Iron Lord - Collector's Edition
description: Free your people from the Iron Lord's merciless grasp!

name: NoEvidence: Scary Horror Quest Survival Story
description: NoEvidence is an intense detective game where you investigate a murder. Navigate a dark environment using only your flashlight. Discover the murder location and prevent the crime. Use detective skills to find clues and important objects like a recorder, tapes, fuses, and a revolver. Solve puzzles and decipher codes to unlock doors and access key areas. With its immersive atmosphere, challenging quests, and gripping storyline, it's a must-play for detective game and thriller fans.

name: Paper Dominoes
description: Get ready to dominate the dominoes in Paper Dominoes - the addictive game that's perfect for all ages! The classic game right in your hands with a beautiful art style.

name: Party Party Time + Character Skin Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Princess Arthur for Nintendo Switch
description:
Port of Princess Arthur for the Nintendo Switch.

A king has left the world. In this country where for generations the king has been decided by the Holy Sword, a ceremony would be held to select the new king. Out of the many people who sought to draw the Sword, only one succeeded. Neither a knight nor royalty, the person was an ordinary girl.

Persuaded by the legendary magician Merlin, the girl begins to live as the king without understanding anything. It is there that she meets the Knights of the Round Table. The girl stands on a battlefield for the first time in her life. She grips the Sword tightly in hand, still not knowing why it chose her. Tears are in her eyes.

The girl learns what love truly is. Even as several threads of fate entwine around and trifle with her, she will continue to love only one. And so, the girl takes the sword in her hand. To cut open fate for the one she loves.

name: Moving Blocks the Identicons Challenge
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai World
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Highway Traffic Racer: Car Racing Simulator
description: Highway Traffic Racer is a new word in the endless arcade racing genre. Drive on the highway, earn money, upgrade your car and buy new ones.

name: Breakfast Bar Tycoon: Co-op Edition
description:
It's almost time for breakfast! Go and prove that your breakfast bar deserves its fame!
Have you ever wondered what it’s like to run your own breakfast kitchen?
In Breakfast Bar Tycoon, you'll learn that it's no easy task!
You will take on the role of a breakfast bar manager and try your best to serve the hordes of hungry customers as quickly as possible.
Take orders, prepare dishes and fight for tips!

name: Urban Flow: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozmic Fantasy: Bouken Shounen Yuu
description: Sin descripción

name: Puyo Puyo! The Medal Edition
description: Puyo Puyo! The Medal Edition is a coin pusher-styled arcade game based on Puyo Puyo! 15th Anniversary, the fifth in Sega's "Medalink" series.

name: Minecraft: Dungeons & Dragons
description: Experience a dramatic tale unfold with Minecraft's Dungeons & Dragons DLC. Explore iconic locations in the Forgotten Realms like Icewind Dale and Candlekeep, battling Beholders, Mimics, and more. Choose your class, unlock classic spells, and ace ability checks to escape sticky situations. Your story awaits!

name: Puyo Puyo DX
description:
Puyo Puyo DX is a mobile Puyo Puyo game released by SEGA MOBILE in 2004 and is considered to be the deluxe mobile version of Minna de Puyo Puyo. It was included in the Sonic Café/Puyo Sega subscription service when it was released, and included enhanced versions of other Puyo Mobile games that were part of the subscription at the time.

This Puyo game is considered to be Lost Media.

name: Puyo Pop Fever DX
description: Puyo Puyo Fever DX is a mobile phone game released for i-mode 90x, Vodafone Live! (256KB) and EZweb (BREW 3.1) devices through the Sonic Cafe portal.

name: Puyo Puyo Touch
description:
Puyo Puyo!! Touch was a free-to-play mobile puzzle video game for iOS and Android.

The game featured the never-before-seen mechanic of "Paint to Clear", which players had to drag to copy the color of Puyo to adjacent ones trying to make 4 or more connect. A clear with 5 or more connected makes an arrow (やじるし) available to make long-reaching clears later. All characters were also able to make use of skills to create arrows and other special items to aid in the puzzle.

On September 30 2016, the service of Puyo Puyo!! Touch was announced to terminate after November 30 2016, making it impossible to play the game after that date.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch
description: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch is a puzzle game published by Sega for Android, iOS and Windows Mobile 6.5 devices. It is part of the Puyo Puyo series and is based on Puyo Puyo Fever, which was released on consoles and PC.

name: Puyo Puyo Zurashi
description: Puyo Puyo Zurashi was the third mobile game as a remake of Sega and Sonic Team's original Puyo Puyo Fever made by Sega and Sonic Cafe. This game was released for the Pocket PC as a downloadable game in Japan on October 20, 2006. Unlike all the games in the series so far, this game was never released out of Japan.

name: Puyo Puyo Solitare
description: Puyo Puyo Solitaire is a mobile game apart of the Puyo Puyo! Sega subscription service released for mobile internet services in 2008-2009 and later, in 2011, for Android devices. It is one of the many games in the subscription and one of some in the Puyo Puyo Fever 2 style. Unfortunately not much info is known about it, same with the subscription service.

name: Running Circles
description:
Play Running Circles! This game will have you Spinning around Dazed & Confused, hungry for one more go! This simple one touch Multiplayer Arcade game is totally Addictive and impossible to put down. How far can you go?

Your goal is to move from Circle to Circle taping the screen at just the right time. You can move both inside and outside the Circles but don’t waste a second… Danger lurks all around you.Great timing and lightning fast reflexes is all it takes to go as far as you can. Collect gold gems to Unlock tons of cool Characters that will help you on your journey.

name: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch Lite
description: Puyo Puyo Fever Touch Lite is a puzzle game developed by Sega for Android and iOS devices. It is the free version of Puyo Puyo Fever Touch. The iOS version was only available through the Sega Collection app.

name: Cops and Robbers!
description:
Play Cops and Robbers! They say that Crime doesn’t pay… Well try it for yourself. In Cops & Robbers your goal is to steal as many gold coins as you can while avoiding being caught by the police.

Tons of different disguises, characters and partners in crime to unlock, each with their unique style and special moves. Bump into unsuspecting passers-by for some extra gold and collect power-ups to help you in your crime wave. Simple One Touch controls make this arcade game fun, challenging and totally addictive.

name: Tiki Totems
description: An exciting physics puzzle block destroying game. Appease the Tiki Gods by carefully removing the unnecessary blocks that dim the might and glory of their beautiful totems. BUT BE CAREFUL!! Don’t drop the totem on the ground cause that makes them angry, and when they get angry you know what happens. Villages and villagers burn.

name: Tower Dash
description:
Play Tower Dash! The super addictive new game from the creators of Bird Climb and Spider Square. In this simple one touch Multiplayer game your goal is to shoot threads left and right to climb up the tower without hitting any of the obstacles.

Sounds Easy? Believe us it is not! You'll be swinging in no time, but it takes super human reflexes to master it! Collect diamonds on your way and unlock insanely cool new heroes!

name: Bird Climb
description:
Bird Climb is a simple one touch Multiplayer Arcade game that is impossible to put down. Challenge your friends to play this fun & addictive game and beat their score.

Tap to fly your Bird to the top and avoid the spikes. The faster you tap, the quicker the bird flies. Collect precious gems on your way to unlock fantastic new characters!

You can invite and play with all your friends in online Multiplayer mode and have multiple battles and challenges open at the same time. Play to compete and win a place at the top of your Friends & Global Ranks. How fast are your reaction skills? This fun and fast paced arcade game will test you to the max.

name: Math Fight: Multiplayer Game
description: Math Fight - Multiplayer Game is one of those fun and educational games. If you need a game for two or more players, the Math Fight is a perfect choice for you!

name: Chotto xx na Watashi no Nichijou: Kiki Dasshutsu!? Gyakuten no Nazotoki Life
description:
Save the heros from these unfortunate pictures!
A simple, touch based time killing escape game

Somethings happening in these ordinary bright, yet sad, illistrations
A hidden object game where you aim to seek out a solution to these "Not-so-sad" dangers!

name: Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Extended Edition
description: Enter a fantastic world full of magic and charm. Rebuild legendary tales with Mosaic Chronicles Deluxe: Extended Edition. A new puzzle game experience awaits.

name: Human or Not?
description: Chat with someone for two minutes, and try to figure out if it was a fellow human or an AI bot. Think you can tell the difference?

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Extended Edition
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Kimi no Mirai
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Tetris - The Absolute: The Grand Master 2 Plus
description:
From beginner to advanced!
Challenge various modes! !

name: Sneaky Monsters
description: Tower Defense with unusual mechanics, where the AI sends the most inconvenient monsters and you have to constantly sell and rebuild towers.

name: Deep Rock Galactic: Season 4 - Critical Corruption
description: Welcome to Season 4 - Critical Corruption! Though we have gained great ground against the rampaging Lithophage in the past months, it remains a constant threat- and to make matters worse, reports of alarming new mutations are starting to come in. Let's get right into it!

name: Marvel's Spider-Man: New Game Plus Update
description: Patch updates 1.07 and 1.08 added a New Game+ mode, Ultimate difficulty, and a series of new features, fixes, and updates.

name: Voxel Doom
description: A mod that replaces 2d characters and props from Doom with fully 3d voxel-based models. For the GZDoom source port.

name: National Videogame Museum
description: This WAD is a near 1:1 recreation of the National Videogame Museum located in Frisco, Texas!

name: Dimension of the Boomed
description: Sin descripción

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Battle of Zhongyuan
description: The first DLC for Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty. It includes new stages, difficulty levels, weapon types, enemies and more, promising an exciting experience for Wo Long experts and novices alike.

name: Hentai Girls
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world inhabited by Yui, Shirayuki, and Etsuko.

name: Moving Blocks Puzzle
description: More than 150 puzzles await you to be solved! Slide the pieces around the empty box until you form the target figure. The figures to be formed are "identicons", which are pixel like figures formed from encoded words.

name: Hero's Hour: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Bandit
description: Driving game released by Data East USA in 1989.

name: Death Game Hotel
description: Death Game Hotel, the online death game battle where players put their own body parts at stake in order to win the championship.

name: Demeo Battles
description: Welcome to the arena! Demeo Battles is a competitive turn-based strategy game for 1-4 players.

name: PowerWash Simulator VR
description: Release the Pressure with PowerWash Simulator! Wash away your worries with the soothing sounds of high-pressure water. Fire up your power washer and blast away every speck of dirt and grime you can find, all with the simple satisfaction of power-washing to a sparkling finish.

name: Racket Club
description: Racket Club takes all the fun of tennis or pickleball and puts it in a box to create a brand new racket sport, built from the ground up for VR.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Justice
description: You are a vampire. You strike from the shadows and drink the blood of both mortal and vampire prey. In a gritty main narrative that includes several side missions and dialogue options, explore a dark and mysterious Venice to improve your abilities and become the ultimate arbiter of justice.

name: Ghost Signal: A Stellaris Game
description: Ghost Signal is a VR action roguelite set in the Stellaris universe, where you captain your ship to battle a multitude of alien species. Partake in dynamic space wars, encounter planet sized creatures, gather valuable loot to conduct research, and more. No journey is the same. Will you find the origins of the mysterious Ghost Signal?

name: Samba de Amigo: Virtual Party
description:
It's time to shake it on center stage in this vibrant rhythm action game. Join Amigo and his friends in an all-new Samba de Amigo, now in VR.
Pick up your maracas and groove to over 40 hit songs from the world's most popular genres, with even more arriving as post-launch DLC!

Feeling confident in your skills? Complete the StreamiGo! challenges to help Amigo rise to fame.
Strut that style by customizing your character with unique costumes and accessories.
Show the world what you've got by competing on the online leaderboards.

name: Silent Slayer: Vault of the Vampire
description: Vanquish an ancient vampiric council in this suspenseful single-player jumpscare game.

name: Underdogs
description:
Wrap yourself in 5 tons of metal and go smashing through a dark scene of underground mech fights!

Bash, crush, maul and rip apart enemy bots and mechs - it’s full-on metal-on-metal violence in this first of its kind physics-based mech brawler.

But rampaging through the pits ain’t all - this is a Roguelike.
Gear up with 100+ items including power tools like chainsaws and wrecking balls, hire hackers and saboteurs, hustle and deal with the gangsters and psychos who run these streets as you claw your way up the food chain.

name: Dungeons of Eternity
description:
Endless fantasy action and adventure await in Dungeons of Eternity. Band together with up to 3 players or play solo using physics-based weapons and magic in this cooperative action RPG built for VR.

Randomly-generated dungeons constructed from hundreds of different chambers offer endless replayability. Explore dark crypts, ruined castles, deep caverns, solve puzzles, and avoid deadly traps.

name: The 7th Guest VR
description:
Experience the most spine-tingling VR mystery adventure of your life.

The classic game that chilled you to the bone in the 90s has been brought back to life, with cutting-edge VR technology that delivers an atmospheric story like no other.

name: Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable
description: Fight for your life against man-eating Titans in Attack on Titan VR: Unbreakable. In a thrilling mix of hunting and action, join the Scout Regiment and put on your Omni Directional Mobility Gear to defend and protect humanity against the Titans.

name: Bulletstorm VR
description: Bulletstorm VR is a brutally creative action shooter that puts players in the ass-kicking boots of the hotheaded space mercenary Grayson Hunt as he shoots, kicks, and leashes all he can see across a hostile world in Virtual Reality!

name: Assassin's Creed Nexus VR
description:
Play a pivotal role in history in this new story built only for VR. Thrust your blade in visceral combat as you climb and parkour anywhere throughout the open maps. Stealthily blend into a crowd, interact with civilians, and feel the rush of air assassinations.

Abstergo Industries has found a way to retrieve powerful lost artifacts that can be used to manipulate people's beliefs. To sabotage their plan, you’ll uncover all-new stories and accomplish new missions as legendary Assassins.

name: Asgard’s Wrath II
description: Awaken, Cosmic Guardian – The fate of reality lies in your hands. Travel across vast realms inhabited by the gods in pursuit of the Trickster God Loki, who threatens to undo the threads of the universe. It’s up to you to battle gods and monsters alike as you take on one of the biggest and most epic scale Action RPGs ever experienced in VR. Alongside legendary Egyptian gods, you’ll fight deadly warriors and awe-inspiring mythical creatures through physics-based, visceral combat with unique weapons and playstyles. Possess unique mortal heroes and convert loyal animals into your own warrior followers as you explore a massive, free-roaming and living world and solve mind-bending god-scale puzzles.

name: Little Cities: Hand Tracking Update
description: The most loved city creator just got cozier with hand tracking. Let go of your controllers and discover a whole new way to play, crafting your little city with simple gestures that puts cozy creation, literally, at your fingertips.

name: Little Cities: Attractions Update
description: Excite your citizens with Attractions – an all-new collection of dozens of delightful items to transform your city, putting everything from billboards to beach huts at your fingertips. Innovative placements will up your Style Rating, adding a fresh layer of depth for our most creative builders.

name: Little Cities: Snowy Islands DLC
description: Building on the picturesque, holiday feel that Little Cities has become known for, the Snowy Islands DLC features two new islands for you to create on, complete with a generous sprinkling of fresh Attractions, buildings, utilities, and the occasional avalanche! Get hands-on with the post-disaster clean-up by re-building demolished areas and clearing roads of snow.

name: Little Cities: Little Citizens Update
description:
The update brings your creations to life with your very own tiny population. Watch the itty-bitty bustle in your city streets and discover all the ways they love to work, rest, and play.

City creation in virtual reality has never been so cozy.

name: Little Cities: Sandbox Update
description: An upcoming update for Little Cities.

name: Ghost Signal: Fleet Expansion
description: This free update adds two new ships - the Pandora and the Iris - with unique characteristics, a Relaxed Mode, and an Autosave feature.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Journey to the Center of the Earth
description: A new course themed after the Jules Verne story.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Laser Lair
description: This is the first course in the Evil Lairs series of courses for Walkabout Mini Golf.

name: Walkabout Mini Golf: Pocket Edition
description: A mobile, non-VR version of Walkabout Mini Golf that supports cross-play with the VR version.

name: Memori
description: Embark on a captivating Platforming adventure in Memori! Master challenging obstacles while unraveling the enigmatic secrets of a peculiar world. Gather clues, solve puzzles, and confront mortality, only to be reborn anew.

name: Turma do Chico Bento
description: Turma do Chico Bento was a social farm simulation game developed by Insolita Studios and published by Level Up! in partnership with Mauricio de Sousa Produções. In the game, the player needed to take care of his farm, planting and taking care of the animals, while participating in adventures as if he were in a story of Chico Bento, the “caipirinha” created by Mauricio de Sousa.

name: Starsiege: Deadzone
description: Starsiege: Deadzone is a multiplayer corridor extraction shooter set in a dark sci-fi universe where humanity is on the brink of extinction. As space mercenaries, known as Raiders, players will team up with two others to explore the derelict stations taken over by sentient AI. As a Raider, your goal is to extract valuable weapons and resources for your faction. Players will select their class and venture into procedurally generated ships making each match unique. Choose from three distinct classes, each with their own unique abilities and work together to overcome the ship's deadly traps and defenses in order to escape. Beware of the other Raiders seeking the same riches.

name: Boom!
description: Boom! is a turn-based PvP battle game in pixel art with over 150 destructible battlefields, 200 characters to unlock, 75 original weapons, private arenas, and much more.

name: Pippo's Quest
description: Pippo's Quest is a platformer advergame in which your mission is to help Xeleco and his gang find all the Pippos that the wicked evil chicken has stolen.

name: 5-Step Steve
description: A crew of kittens need rescuing. Dozens of puzzles stand in your way. And you only have 5 steps to solve them.

name: Etrian Odyssey HD Character Set DLC
description: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Joker from Persona 5 Royal and Ringo from Soul Hackers 2 to your character creation options.

name: New Nintendo 3DS Internet Browser: Breakout
description: Breakout is a hidden Easter Egg game built into the web browser application on Japanese models of the New Nintendo 3DS. The game is accessed when tapping out the Mario theme on the bookmarks menu of the browser.

name: Everybody 1-2-Switch
description: Mix up your next get-together with the Everybody 1-2-Switch, the follow-up to 1-2 Switch. Grab some Joy-Cons or smart devices for team-based games that are easy to set up and feature everything from balloons to aliens, and more! People at your next party can get moving and show off their teamwork in this multiplayer mashup.

name: Subway Surfers
description: An arcade port of Subway Surfers.

name: Desert Bus
description: Desert Bus is a mod for Undertale that recreates the original game of Desert Bus with an 8 hour long room in Undertale.

name: Harry Potter Tamagotchi
description: Harry Potter Tamagotchi is an upcoming crossover Tamagotchi Nano model based on the Harry Potter series.

name: Grisaia Phantom Trigger 5.5 to 08
description:
Grisaia Phantom Trigger is finally complete!
The second half of the series is now available in one package!

name: Unimime: Unicycle Madness
description:
"Become a mime!", they said.
"Riding a unicycle is easy!", they said.
I don't like them."

name: Super Hero Demolition
description: Demolish everything!

name: So Much Stuff: Collector's Edition
description: The ultimate sorting and matching game!

name: Mad Road: Apocalyptic Shooter Survival Killer
description: Get ready for an addictive and lowpoly gaming experience in "Mad Road"! Take control of a lone biker on a mission to cleanse the world from threats and chaos.

name: Beat Them Up: Street Fight Band Simulator
description: A game in the classic and familiar Beat Them Up genre, in tribute to history, everything in the game is done according to the old traditions of beat em up games, but with nicer graphics and more convenient controls.

name: Pixel Family Fun: Extended Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Mojito the Cat: Definitive Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Rumble Fish 2: Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the game plus 3 additional DLCs: Hazama, Beatrice and Greed!

description:
The Deluxe Edition contains the We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie game along with the Katamari Damacy Series Music Pack.

name: Dogotchi: Virtual Pet
description: ﻿Set off on a journey of nurturing and attending to your digital companion in Dogotchi: Virtual Pet. These charming dogs depicted in satisfying pixel art are bound to steal your heart!

name: Too Many Super Shotguns
description: Shotguns.

name: Nobody Told Me About ID
description: Nobody Told Me About id is a love letter from DOOM fans to the iconic trinity of Build Engine games; Duke Nukem 3D, Blood and Shadow Warrior. Whether it be ludicrous gore or explosions, NTMAi tries its best to faithfully replicate all things Build on DOOM while also enhancing the base gameplay. Your arsenal may be tough, but some enemies will have a trick or two up their sleeves...

name: Asuka-san ha Nabikanai
description: Sin descripción

name: Raid over Moscow
description: The USSR has launched a huge attack on the USA, and the only hope for the free world is for you (as leader of a US Squadron of fighters) to destroy their defense bases. This is done in a multi-stage action game with some similarities to the same developer's Beach Head. All the mini-games must be completed before the time limit on the bomb is expired.

name: The Wanderer
description:
A fresh look at the myth of Frankenstein
Play as the Creature, a wanderer without memory or past, a virgin spirit in a completely fabricated body. To forge the destiny of this artificial being who is ignorant of both Good and Evil, you will have to explore the vast world and experience joy and sorrow.

name: Total Tiki-Taka
description:
A one touch endless football game based on combined styles of Total football and Tiki-Taka.
Total Tiki-Taka is a fast paced, fresh take on football games. With combined elements of Tiki-Taka soccer and Total football, this game will stretch your concentration powers to the limit.
Take control of your favorite teams and master the art of passing in this frantic passing game. Total Tiki-Taka puts you on the football training grounds where real players are made. Keep passing the ball among the players to keep the session going and bettering your score. Like Total football, the players will keep changing their positions so keep an eye out on their movements.

name: Viral Days
description:
Heal. Protect. Prevent.
Take good care of people as they walk the streets of your town. As your area is plagued by a new virus, you have to distribute masks, enforce social distancing, quarantine infected persons, and impose lockdowns from time to time.

name: Stroke The Dik-Dik
description:
The Dik-Dik is a small antelope, by nature they are pretty shy and will often run away if you try to approach it. This one tough, it's friendly and will stand to attention allowing you to stroke it.

Stroke your own Dik-Dik in your own living room, bedroom, bathroom, wherever you have your TV.

name: Run Man
description: Sin descripción

name: Cat Ping Pong
description: Cat Ping Pong is an arcade style ping pong game. The user controls a cat paddle to bat a yarn ball back and forth against its opponent. Use the meddling rat in the middle of the field to gain speed, and change trajectory of the ball to score on the opposing cat!

name: Steep: X Games Pack
description: Welcome to the X Games, the world's most famous winter sports freestyle competition. Grab your board and your ski's and travel to Alaska's spectacular snowparks where you'll discover new events, new moves, and a whole new level of competition. Includes 90's and Rocket Wings DLC.

name: Snake Crayon Run
description: From Classic Snake game to Endless Running game with Colorful themes, break color blocks, and challenge your finger skill to survive.

name: Sonic Surfer
description:
This game reacts to your ambient noise! Play ‚Sonic Surfer‘ when you ride the bus, at the park, in a waiting line or at other places where noise in different soundlevels occurs.
Surf the waves and don't fall off your board! Can you collect enough suns to stop the moonrise?

name: Worlds War 1
description: Worlds War 1 is a shooter sci-fi game where you fight against all odds in a battle to save the earth from the aliens who started attacking the earth - and your home.

name: FPVSIM FPV Simulator
description: FPVSIM is an FPV simulator that is designed & tuned for high consistency with research level quadrotor dynamics simulation engine.

name: The Many Sins of House Ocampo
description: Sin descripción

name: Croaked
description: Help the undead frogs get to safety in this devastated world filled with treacherous lava pits and fire-breathing dragons.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - Rashid
description:
Rashid is the first DLC character for Street Fighter 6 and the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass. The character was released on July 24th, 2023.

Capcom describes him as following:
”The Soaring Eagle of the Desert” that fights using parkour. With the wind as his ally, he outfoxes opponents with his high mobility. Born into nobility, he's a carefree but earnest man. Loves video streaming.

name: Bitcoin Man Clicker
description: A clicker game with the goal to click on as many bitcoins as possible before running out of lives.

name: Hypnospace Outlaw & Slayers X: Terminal Aftermath: Vengance of the Slayer Bundle
description: 2 games in one bundle!

name: Slidercrash
description: Experience a brand new puzzle-challenge: Slidercrash. Combine Sliders of the same color on a carefully designed retro playing-field. But the devil is in the details. Mirrors and rails redirect the Sliders, walls and rocks stop them, minds or the abyss let them meet their maker. And then there are the other Sliders…

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - A.K.I.
description:
A.K.I. is the second DLC character for Street Fighter 6 in the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A poison-wielding apprentice of F.A.N.G, the former Shadaloo officer.
Enchanted by the power of toxins, nothing brings her more joy than testing them on a new target—other than attention from her “master,” that is.

name: Sloomy
description:
Super-fast, crazy-addictive and mega-exciting! Play your way through bee-autiful gardens full of colorful flowers! Harvest floweres as mush as you can before the night comes down.
How many flowers can you harvest in just 60 seconds?

name: Piggy Piggy: Boom
description: Try getting Piggy Piggy safe across to the other side of the level. Always stay on the path or bad things will happen. Also be aware of the many traps and enemies that are luring around.

name: Dungeon Boss: Respawned
description: Battle. Explore. Defend. Summon a crew of mighty heroes to guard your dungeons, steal treasure and fight foes. Assemble a team of warriors, goblins and other mighty heroes to embark on an epic adventure across fantasy lands.

name: Galacdrive
description:
Dodge asteroids, fight bosses, and use powerful abilities in Galacdrive!
Well, you did it. The enemy mothership is destroyed. But you only completed half of the mission. Not only do you need to take the deadly warp lane home, but you also need to fend off all the ships hunting your bounty. Will you make it home and what will you encounter along the way?

name: Pit Stop Racing: Club Vs. Club
description:
Easy! Intense!
Have fun with 'One Touch Racing'
Discard the hard control system of the existing racing game, and play the race by matching the timing.
The control system is as easy for a 3 -year-old, but the judgment is narrow and so it requires a high degree of concentration.
Win the winners in each tournament in order, and become the best racer !

name: Roly Poly Putt
description:
Platforming meets mini-golf in this wacky physics-based 3D platformer. You control Roly Poly through a myriad of levels spanning diverse landscapes in a game of miniature golf…except YOU are the ball!
Maneuver around tight corners, jump over treacherous pits, zip through dark tunnels, and other obstacles by tilting your device to each side. Your goal is to get to the flag at the end of each level with as few strokes as possible, but don’t forget to collect as many sugar cubes along the way as you can!

name: Spirit of the Island: Beach Resort
description: Spirit of the Island: Beach Resort is set to bring this much requested feature at no additional cost! With the new DLC, you will have the option to pick a brand new starting location — Beach Resort.

name: Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys - Decorations Pack 12
description:
It's time to return into the fantastic world of Clumsy Rush: Ultimate Guys.
Enjoy new decorations in the twelfth official DLC.

name: Om Nom: Run - Costumes and Themes
description:
New outfits, skins and biomes.
This DLC includes:
-36 new caps
-32 new gloves
-36 new outfits
-32 new shoes
-2 new multiplayer map biomes

name: Om Nom: Run - Ultimate Edition
description:
This bundle includes:
- The base game with 140 single player campaign levels, multiple local multiplayer modes and lots of options for character customization.
- "Costumes and Themes" DLC with over 130 new outfits and skins.

name: Dessert DIY: Complete Edition
description:
Preparing delicious desserts is a piece of cake. Try it yourself!
Make sweet ice cream, popsicles and waffles using your creativeness in one of the best dessert decorating games right now.

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Matt Hardy
description: Play as two of the many Matt Hardys: Matt Hardy and Broken Matt Hardy. Pre-order Bonus for AEW Fight Forever!

name: All Elite Wrestling: Fight Forever - Elite Edition
description:
The AEW: Fight Forever Elite Edition includes access to even more AEW wrestlers and over-the-top minigames including:

- The AEW: Fight Forever FTR: Revival Pack which features AEW wrestlers Dax Harwood and Cash Wheeler PLUS minigames JoinUs and Deth Race-X
- The AEW: Fight Forever Limitless Bunny Bundle which features AEW wrestlers The Bunny and Keith Lee PLUS minigames MJF Car Thrash and Sloth Sling
- The AEW: Fight Forever Hookhausen Very Handsome, Very Evil Pack which features AEW wrestlers HOOK and Danhausen

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - SSS Summer Splash Set
description: A DLC bundle that includes Daydream 'SSS Summer Splash' and swimsuits for Elie, Tio, Rixia, Noel, KeA, Lloyd, Randy and Wazy.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Standard Cosmetic Set
description:
A set of 15 cosmetic items that includes the following DLC:
- Crow's Branch Campus Uniform
- Easternwear outfits for Elie, Alisa, Tio, Altina, Lapis, Nadia and Noel
- Eastern Commander Set (Commander Rean, Commander Lloyd, Commander C)
- Commander C Sans Mask
- Eastern Warrior Set (Warrior Crow, Warrior Randy, Warrior Swin)

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie - Premium Cosmetic Set
description: A bundle of cosmetic items that includes 18 sets of accessories along with a swimsuit for Swin, Nadia, C and Lapis.

name: Super Hero Demolition
description:
Demolish everything!
Use superhero powers to demolish block structures!
Upgrade your powers until you are strong enough to demolish it all!
each hero has different powers, which hero are you?

name: Highway Traffic Racer
description: Highway Traffic Racer is a new word in the endless arcade racing genre. Drive on the highway, earn money, upgrade your car and buy new ones.

name: Project: Obscurion
description: Project: Obscurion is an immersive spot-the-difference horror game. Use security cameras to explore detailed locations and uncover hidden anomalies. Test your perception and unravel the truth in this captivating horror experience.

name: Reasoning of Courage Nori 3 Balanced Diet
description:
The boy, courage, solves the mystery of miso soup
solve!

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Alchemist of the End & the Secret Key - Additional Area "Rosca Island"
description:
Adds a new region (open field) and World Quests unique to that region.
This content requires the game clear data in order to play.

name: Hentai World: Special Edition
description: Feast your eyes with Akane, Rose, and Nanami in the most sensual puzzle game experience Nintendo Switch has to offer.

name: Hentai World: Puppy Nanami
description:
Check the newest appearance of Nanami, one of the girls from the main game, in her new puppy look.
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Puppy Nanami. Every success on your part will make her happier!

name: Hentai World: Kitty Rose
description:
Check the newest appearance of Rose, one of the girls from the main game, in her new feline look.
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Kitty Rose. Every success on your part will make her happier!

name: Hentai World: Foxy Akane
description:
Check the newest appearance of Akane, one of the girls from the main game, in her new foxy look.
Sink into the familiar anime art style of Hentai World. Progress through the story by solving all of the puzzles. The difficulty will increase depending on the "outfit" Foxy Akane. Every success on your part will make her happier!

name: We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie: Special Edition
description:
The second title in the Katamari Damacy series has returned in a remastered, powered-up version!

We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie is a fully remastered version of We Love Katamari Damacy, originally released in 2005, with new and improved graphics and gameplay enhancements to make it easier to jump in and have fun.

The Special Edition contains We Love Katamari REROLL+ Royal Reverie, the Little Prince Costume, and the Katamari Damacy Series Music Bundle.

name: Isle of Jura Fishing Trip: Ultimate Edition
description: Visit the remarkable Isle of Jura and catch some delicious fish!

name: Super Drunken Guy
description: Are you drunken enough for that game?

name: Street Fighter 6: Ultimate Edition
description: The additional content for the Ultimate Edition comes from the Year 1 Ultimate Pass which includes 4 new characters, 3 outfits with colors 1-10 for the new characters, 2 additional stages and 7,700 Drive tickets (in-game currency).

name: Cuboy
description: Cuboy is a minimalist platform game.

name: Velocity Vortex
description: Velocity Vortex is a challenging fast pased Time Attack Platformer where you only have 5 seconds to finish each level. As you go through the levels the game gets faster, and as you die the game gets slower.

name: X-Force Under Attack
description: X-Force Under Attack brings back all the charm of shmup games from the 80's/90's. It's a frenetic and chaotic space shooter created from amazing graphics with insane battles against extremely difficult bosses.

name: Etrian Odyssey II HD: Character Set DLC
description: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Demi-fiend from Shin Megami Tensei III: Nocturne and Teddie from Persona 4 Golden to your character creation options.

name: Etrian Odyssey III HD Character Set DLC
description: Originally available as a pre-order bonus, and extended for two weeks as an early purchase reward, this purchase adds the ATLUS-themed character portraits of Nahobino from Shin Megami Tensei V and Aigis from Persona 3 Portable to your character creation options.

name: Sono Hanabira: YuriCycle
description: Risa, her weight in extremely (beep) condition due to all those delicious snacks and tea, has resolved to go on a diet! However… cutting sweets out of your diet is extremely hard, so seeing how much Risa is suffering, Mai recommends a cycling diet. Hearing how Mai already successfully lost five kilograms, Risa is extremely interested!

name: KBRD
description:
KBRD is a fast-paced and exciting game that puts a unique twist on the classic Breakout formula.

In this game, you control the paddle using the keys on your keyboard, allowing for precise and skillful play. As you progress through the various levels, you must hit obstacles to gain points, and then score even more points by hitting the ball with the paddle.

The smaller the paddle, the higher the multiplier, so be careful and aim well to maximize your score.

name: Bruxólico
description: Bruxólico is a new action platformer for the ZX Spectrum where you will hear/play/read the story of the Ghost-Ox, the little creature that came out from a doomed bottomless well, along with other unbelievable witchlish beings, fruits of our own ills and maledictions.

name: Bruce Campbell vs Ganon
description: Bruce Campbell vs Ganon is a mod for The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past. It contains new dungeons, new puzzles, and harder bosses

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - Ed
description:
Ed is the third DLC character for Street Fighter 6 in the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A Psycho Power-wielding youth aged up rapidly by Shadaloo's experimentation, on a journey and a mission to free other subjects. He gets his short temper and foul mouth from Balrog, his former mentor.

name: Street Fighter 6: Year 1 - Akuma
description:
Akuma is the fourth DLC character for Street Fighter 6 and final character in the Year 1 Character/Ultimate Pass.

A demon of combat that has welcomed the Satsui no Hado into his being in his quest to become the ultimate master of the fist.

name: Obey! The Game
description: The rules are changing on you. Be prepared to obey or disobey the task at-hand. Survive as long as you can in this mashup up of microgaming and (strangely) Simon Says.

name: Magic Purple
description: Magic Purple is an action platformer released for arcades in 1996.

name: Piko Interactive Arcade 1
description: Piko Interactive Arcade 1 features 9 unusual, varied and rare arcade games from the mid to late 1990s, including Dragon Master, Master's Fury, Fancy World: Earth of Crisis, Magic Purple, The Legend of Silkroad and Burglar X from Korean developer Unico, plus Art & Magic's visually impressive sports title Ultimate Tennis, and Steel Force and Diver Boy from Electronic Devices Italy

name: Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered
description:
Duke Nukem 1+2 Remastered is only available as part of Evercade's Duke Nukem Collection 1, planned for release in November 2023.

A new collection of the original Duke Nukem games that has been developed by Blaze Entertainment. Featuring multiple improvements to the early 90s computer classic including 60fps gameplay, upscaled graphics, parallax background and smooth scrolling, along with re-recorded music, a redesigned HUD, and widescreen support. With the ability to play the games as they were originally also included.

name: There's Always a Madman: Fight or Flight
description: Step into the shoes of the suave secret agent Franklin Benjamin in this single-player spy thriller interactive novel. Drive fast cars, seduce beautiful women, and do whatever it takes to save the day against impossible odds. Because there's always a madman, and you're the best agent we've got!

name: Supercooked!
description: Cook your way to the top by beating eight exciting stages alone or with up to three friends in this action-packed new title for your SNES inspired by Ghost Town Games' Overcooked!

name: NESert Golfing
description: NESert Golfing is a 2D golf game for the NES, directly inspired by Desert Golfing.
